column2: We Brothers, We Sisters, We Vod'e Few
column4:
“In terms of disposition? Academics? Thinking on his feet? You’ve very nearly brought me a perfect candidate. Whatever happened on Kuat, we will see to it that he has space to heal, but Mace you need to understand that he will not be leaving the program unless he wishes to. Once he is in, he’s in and the Council will not be able to recall him without incredibly compelling cause.”

Every Knight has potential, that is a given. But Kenobi had notes in his file to make him a diplomat. Certainly, the Council had been banking on him following Qui-Gon’s footsteps as a crisis negotiator.

If he signs off on this, then they might have to rethink that plan. Have to find somebody else, because Kenobi’s entire job will rely on him staying away from undue attention.

[Updates Fridays]
column6: Because it has been raised twice now, I would like to re-iterate the most recent addition to the tags. The ships in this fic are all background; they are neither the focus of the story, nor do they affect the plot in any significant way. As such, they fit the Archive's guideline of "Gen", and I have tagged this fic as such. Their presence does not indicate a misrepresentation. Rather, their inclusion, usually by way of occasional and oblique reference, was a way by which I could emphasize the lives these characters have outside of their immediate stories to further demonstrate their motivations and reasoning for certain actions later in the story. The inclusion of the tags was a way to let people who may not like either ship know that they would encounter it here, and that if they did not wish to then they may not wish to click this fic.

column4:
Lan Wangji dies after the thirty-third strike. Lan Xichen does not handle it well.

*fleabag voice* This is a fix it.

May I offer you a little excerpt:

Tracing back his steps, all his life, every decision he’s ever made, every bruise and every cut – it leads back to his father. Jin Guangyao has regret nestled where silent calculation used to sit. He’s not surprised to still feel the cold prickle of acrimony right next to it.
A kick to the chest and Jin Guangyao had promised to ascend those stairs in bright Jin Gold and rise to meet his father on equal footing. Now he’s dressed in Lan Blue and no chance to fulfill that promise.
He makes a new one then, staring into the flames. He swears it on the memory of Nie Mingjue’s lips against his skin and Lan Xichen’s cold silver eyes. He’s made of regret instead of Jin Gold now and he will not cower down in fear. He will make his father pay for it.
column6:
*waves* so this is the WIP I talked about. It basically started with another rewatch of the temple scene where jgy says "I never wanted to hurt you" which in my humble opinion may be the truth but is somewhat laughable. Because he did. So I forced him to confront that.
Comments would be really aprreciated cause i'm somewhat self conscious about this.

Oh. For Chapter 1, please mind that I kill Lan Wangji in this chapter. It's what propels the whole story into motion. So if that's not your cup of tea, you might want to leave now. I really tried to make this angsty.
Enjoy!

column2: I Started From the Bottom/And Now I’m Rich
column4:
“First, you get the money. Then you get the power, respect - hos come last.”

 

Wen Qing traps Wei Wuxian in the Demon Slaughtering Cave, but Wei Wuxian isn’t interested in being the beneficiary of the Wen Remnants’ noble sacrifice. His efforts to free himself accidentally send him back to the beginning of the Sunshot Campaign. Coreless but armed with demonic cultivation, knowledge of the future and his wits, Wei Wuxian takes advantage of this opportunity to come out on top of both the war and its aftermath—before either has a chance to happen—by marrying and swiftly burying the cultivation world’s worst men.

Lan Wangji is confused, hurt, and uncomfortably aroused by Wei Wuxian’s improbably elaborate series of Sect-themed bridal negligees.
column6:
I always think of stuff I write as inherently collaborative, and that's especially true of this one.

verity checked over the historical and totally ahistorical clothing to make sure I didn't say anything ridiculous, and gave some notes about the Qishan pacing and agency that reshaped the piece.
uminohikari helped talk me through the power dynamics questions Verity had raised. She also told me the old-fashioned word for 'husband' I wanted to use now meant gigolo.
mongrelmind did an early read and gave me some incredibly useful notes on Jiang Cheng.
aeriallon's primary-beta helped me take the conversations I'd had regarding agency and do something concrete with them, turning worries into realised themes.

And many, many people gave me music recs. This would be a much shittier thing without the crew.
column7:
I'm trying to bring this in line with the modern mainland Chinese standards for Pinyin (discussed here https://uminohikari.dreamwidth.org/9276.html). Thus Hanguangjun, A Zhan, Lan furen. I appreciate that's a bit jarring for people whose knowledge of Pinyin is drawn from fandom osmosis, myself included, but there is apparently some firm consensus around best practice that I'd like to respect. I hope doing so will make loan word usage in English language fic less awkward for the fandom's many Chinese speakers. Please feel free to point out failures to fall in with the latest standardisation.

Ke: “Days were also divided into smaller units, called kè (刻). One kè was usually defined as 1⁄100 of a day until 1628 [...]. Using the definition of kè as 1⁄100 of a day, each kè is equal to 0.24 hours, 14.4 minutes, or 14 minutes 24 seconds.” https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_timekeeping#Dual_hour:_Sh%C3%AD

I asked a lot of friends for Black Widow Sugar Baby Bops while plotting this fic, so each chapter has some of their recommendations attached. These are not necessarily anything to do with the specific chapter, I just wanted to include everyone’s contributions!

column4: Seventeen-year-old Shang Qinghua, a lowly outer disciple of An Ding Peak, is staring at the realized version of his favorite character and the man has horns. Horns that he’s not supposed to have! Because Airplane Shooting Towards The Sky did not imagine Mobei-Jun having horns! What the hell is this?!
column6:
I do not personally picture the SVSSS demons generally having horns, but I think horns are a very fun interpretation to explore, so I wrote this one shot to exercise some random ideas about MBJ having majestic horns. This is, like, maybe a step above Crack Treated Seriously? It's very fluff and humor for Moshang.

Also, I couldn't be bothered to title this anything clever.

The implied/referenced cannibalism is in reference to Mobei-Jun's family rituals and history.

Enjoy! 😘💕❤️
column7:
- EDIT: I now have a rec post to share on Tumblr if you're on tumblr!

- EDIT: A rec post to share on Twitter.

- Me: *ends up making this a 'skip the decades of pining and the worst of the misunderstandings' fix-it fic* "It's because I love them and they deserve it."
Me: *bullies Shang Qinghua and Mobei-Jun a little bit* "This is also because I love them and they deserve it."

- I threw in the made-up lore about Mobei-Jun's family because 1) I think it's extremely funny to have SQH hook up with his Dream Guy, only to have some "oh yeah, he's actually VERY MUCH NOT HUMAN" moments. 2) I like connecting Mobei-Jun to the Eternal Abyss because of the Immortal Alliance Conference and also his OP teleportation powers. 3) I think it's a very funny contrast to MBJ repeatedly embarrassing himself by tearing up Shang Qinghua's low ceilings. Dude, your monstrous demon ancestors are watching you repeatedly take yourself out on low doorways and they're fucking embarrassed for you.

- "Well, except for the occasional monster-focused weirdo." *cough* Shen Yuan. *cough*

(But also, like, me too, man.)

- Shang Qinghua: "Mobei-Jun might maybe spare my life because I know how to make bath bombs?"
Mobei-Jun: "I'm already looking into family planning, by which I mean I'm plotting my father and uncle's deaths and I've already figured out how we're going to have children. Be prepared to abandon your sect at a moment's notice to begin planning our wedding."

- EDIT: I'm headcanoning here that MBJ did actually kind of discuss marriage with SQH, but because MBJ was incapable of being explicit about his romantic intent because he was SUPER NERVOUS, the entire awkward conversation flew completely over Shang Qinghua's head. MBJ left that conversation like, "He's open to marrying me!" SQH left that conversation like, "Fuck, I need to drop off those forms for my shifu." If I get the inspo, I may type up that conversation, but I wanted to marriage thing to COMPLETELY BLINDSIDE here. Shang Qinghua can't allow himself to focus on the sexy man chilling in his bed, so he is focused on those damn horns instead, and misses his own damn engagement.

- I'm thinking that I'd like to add some one shots for Liu Mingyan/Sha Hualing, for Tianlang-Jun & Zhuzhi-Lang, and for Luo Binghe/Shen Qingqiu | Shen Yuan to this fic at some point.

❤️💕 ART! 💕❤️

- A horned, non-human-looking Mobei-Jun in demonic formalwear by Tossawary

column6:
De-anon, please!

Notes: The word "clit" is used in this to describe Sizhui's anatomy.

Prompt:
prompt: zhuiyi like to pretend they're brothers when they fuck, as a treat.
+ incest kink (obviously)
+ calling each other gege/didi (preferably jingyi as gege and sizhui as didi, but i'm not opposed to flipping it. i do have a preference for smaller sizhui but again go with whatever your heart desires)
+ any direction, any kink (see dnws please)
+ everything is consensual
a-ok, if you want:
+ underage
+ trans characters (but please keep them both boys, so no genderbending)
+ bdsm
+ au where zhuiyi are honest to god biological brothers and just really lean into that fact when they bang
+ honestly i'm very chill about things so just check the dnws and if it's not, like, explicitly mentioned, just assume it's probably alright!
setting/canon/etc: any canon, jianghu or modern settings.

column4:
Squinting down at the hiding child, Shang Hua begins to hear the distant shouting of men. At the noise, the child below lets out a soft keening whimper, endeavoring to shove themselves further into the shadows of the barn. 

The indistinct murmur of voices clarify into vicious laughter, calls of “That beast!” “Flush him out!” “We’ll teach him a lesson he’ll never forget!” fill the farmstead and the child below chokes back a sob.

Shang Hua swings himself down out of the loft before his brain fully processes the situation. The child’s blue eyes widen with fear but Shang Hua holds a finger to his lips and waves for the kid to come closer “Come on,” he hisses, very aware of the rising voices of the men outside. ‘” I can boost you up to the loft and pull up the ladder.”

Shang Hua's plan to escape his own An-Ding plotline results in the interruption of his favorite Demon Lord's backstory. Can he really just leave the young Mobei-Jun to suffer?
column6:
Haha oh god I've never written fanfiction before, but hey, it's Quarantine hours baybee and wow does nothing matter.
SVSSS, MDZS, and TGCF have all been a delight to read over the past months and BOY do I love Shang Qinghua and his weird identity/self esteem issues.
Directly inspired by this particular art by ukuples LINK .

If there's anything glaringly wrong please let me know!
Also Blessing to my sweet friend who beta read this. I love you, and I won't stop loving you bby.

column4:
Two months pass and it feels less like Lan Zhan has a roommate and more like having a penpal in close proximity, leaving notes on different parts of their shared space.

He finds Lan Zhan! There are spiders! I wasn’t able to kill them before I had to leave. Please please please help. They are LYING IN WAIT. posted inside their front door.

To which he responds: I have caught the spiders and released them in the garden.

YOU ARE MY HERO. There is a stickman with his hands on his waist and wearing a cape stuck on his teapot the next morning.

 
Or, they were roommates.

column4:
“It is not a coup,” Meng Yao says, which he has said at every weekly covert cheeseburger assignation since they began doing them. “A coup is, quote: a sudden, violent, and illegal seizure of power from a government. Unquote.”

“The HOA counts as a governing body. Trying to take it over is a coup.”

***

Two gremlins, eating cheeseburgers in the car in a parking lot at 1am, five feet apart because they're not friends.

column6:
Title from "Want You Gone" from the Portal 2 soundtrack, one of my most favorite songs about an unreliable narrator.

A brief note on names: You will notice almost immediately that although this is a modern AU, they still have courtesy names (which, in real life, have fallen out of use). To answer your first question: Yes, this is an intentional artistic decision :D
To answer your second question: Well, the Watsonian explanation for it is a total mystery. *handwaves* it just be like that. The Doylist explanation is that I like courtesy names and, idk, it just gives me a weird feeling when people other than WWX call LWJ by his familiar name.

Anyway, enjoy :D
column7:
Thank you to all of my betas! Extra thank yous as well to Jenn for reading the WIP avidly from day one and telling me the answers to all my dilemmas, and also to Holly for being a perpetual font of wisdom and excellent resources. <3

Meng Yao vs. the Board of the Home Owners Association is going to be a series of smallish fics and vignettes, so plz subscribe to the series page rather than this specific fic if you want those sweet update notifications. Also, your comments are literally the only thing I live for. :D

column4:
Izuku has plans for everything.

He plans out what to say to the cashier when ordering coffee, he plans out his homework before even opening his textbook. He has a whole ten-year plan for how he’s going to get into UA’s hero course and get his hero license fully quirkless. He plans for every wild, unlikely scenario he can think of because his anxiety gets so bad if he doesn’t go through every possible outcome, every way his life could landslide into disaster–– but Izuku never planned for this.

For once, he doesn’t have a plan and he doesn’t have time to think of one. All he can see is Yagi-san’s lined, kind face looking resigned as he stares down the villain in his shop. Yagi-san, who is the closest thing to a father figure Izuku has ever had.

Izuku doesn’t think. He just moves.

(Or: Izuku saves the number one hero, gets a hero license way earlier than anyone wanted, realizes that maybe hero society isn’t as great as he thought it was, and everything just kind of falls apart from there.)

column2: Ref: Incident at Hogwarts Concerning Gilderoy Lockhart, EQ-1993-16
column4:
Gilderoy Lockhart was a public figure—until he, under rather mysterious circumstances, lost his memories and was permanently locked up in St. Mungo’s Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries. No further mention is made of him, and he fades into obscurity, and such is the fickle nature of fame.

But does that make sense? Let’s say, instead, that he doesn’t. Let’s say that his tragedy draws attention—and let’s say the public furor gets him the public enquiry that he deserves.
column5: [['For fencesit.', ['fencesit', '/users/fencesit/gifts']]]
column7:
A few weird hypothetical thoughts for the future had this actually happened within canon—Harry, Ron, and Hermione would generally probably have been more mistrusting of Dumbledore, the media and the Ministry of Magic well before book 5, and the general public knowledge of Harry being a Parselmouth would have probably had an impact on their trust of Harry as the Chosen One. But it seemed unavoidable, since the former follows as a result of Dumbledore being unable to shield them from the enquiry, and the latter is simply key to the events.

In any case, I hope you enjoyed! I loved getting the chance to dip my feet into writing a public enquiry, though in this case I modelled the legal part on HP canon, i.e. it's pretty close to what Harry goes through in Book 5.

column4:
Shen Jiu does not go to Cang Qiong Mountain Sect. He does not go to the Immortal Alliance Conference; Wu Yanzi has an accident before they have a chance. Instead, Shen Jiu goes to one of the few places that have proven to be a refuge for him and asks for a job. When it turns out he has talent, well… At least it’s honest work.

The first time Shen Jiu meets Liu Qingge, things go a little differently.
column6:
"Did you hear?" a disciple of Bai Zhan whispers to his shimei. "The Head Disciple of Bai Zhan has been visiting the male qin player at the Warm Red Pavilion!"

Also, a brief warning for the decapitation of a demon. You can skip it when you get to the paragraph that starts with, “Shen-ge doesn’t make a sound…”
column7:
Hello, thank you for reading and I hope you enjoyed it! I love kudos and comments, so please leave those for me.

I am aware that since the events of this story take place before the ascension ceremony, Liu Qingge may not have the name “Qingge” yet (as well as the others). However, for the sake of the story, I have elected to pretend they’ve already been given their names in preparation for the ceremony that will be held in a few years in line with the 79 extras, part 4.

You can find me on Twitter if you want to see me retweet art and talk about my WIPs.

column2: to love another (and to learn yourself)
column4:
Seeking the sort of affection he had glimpsed in that other world, Luo Binghe decides to find his own Shen Yuan and kidnap him back to his world. There, he’ll be kept and treated like any of his other wives, and in return Luo Binghe will get to experience the soft love he so desperately craves.

Or, that had been the plan, until Shen Yuan spat in his face and refused to cooperate unless Luo Binghe said please and thank you.

Luo Binghe retaliates with messy attempts at dates, demonic courting gifts, and slow progress towards learning how to be a decent person.

 
--

column4:
In which Uchiha Itachi is born, lives and loves as Sirius Black, son of Orion and Walburga Black, brother to one Regulus Black.

It goes about as well as can be expected.
column6:
So - a fair warning. This one is a tad - well, not darker, but moodier perhaps. Shit happens. People are terrible to each other. Walburga Black is just about as pleasant as the Canon would suggest from afar, but now she's front and centre.

Then there's a base-level of trauma from being a child-assassin.

So - yeah. It's not a horror, or a tragedy by any means. It's very much an adventure story. But it's 'harder' than the source texts.

column4: Tubbo has finally gotten stable ground under his feet. With his young pre-teen years up to sixteen spent traveling, he finally settled into a cottage on the outskirts of The Antarctic Empire. He's been there for a little over a year now, and everything was looking up. From his crops and plants, he made decent money, plenty to keep him alive and relatively comfortable, even during the ever freezing Winters. Finally, a place where he could live permanently, without fear, exhaustion, and that experienced prejudice to his kind and other non-Human's few and far between. But, his life he made for himself gets ten times more complicated when he finds an injured boy in the forest, bleeding to death upon the ground.
column6:
I'm honestly probably going to delete this later on. I really do like this AU idea I came up with and want to share it with you all, but I'm also really nervous. I'm just kind of embarrassed about writing fanfiction for Mcyt and don't want people to not like it. I don't know, I guess I'll have to see as I go along. But I do hope you enjoy :)

 

Also, mentions of child neglect, discrimination, and violence. Just mentioned though, so nothing is described. And just a slight description of blood at the end. Just want everyone to be safe.

On another topic, can we please change the character tags? Why do they have to have their real names for people who don't want their real names to be used?

column4:
As he stood poised atop a cliff holding their son in his hands, Mobei Jun lifted his eyebrow at his husband who had thrown himself to the ground. He attempted to gently pull his leg away from Shang Qinghua but that only made Qinghua lock his hold on it tighter. The smaller man was inconsolable. Oh why, oh why did he write this stupid book where parents throw their little BABIES off cliffs for something as trivial as TRAINING?!

--
In which Shen Yuan is reborn into the baby of side characters, Shang Qinghua and Mobei Jun. Its strange but not bad... aside from his demon Father attempting to throw him off a cliff in order to complete some absurd 'demonic trial!'

column4: Jin Zixuan, after growing up a lonely single child, is delighted by his new brother. He is less delighted by those that don’t treat him with the proper respect.
column6:
This had originally been inspired by this character analysis/rant:
https://drwcn.tumblr.com/post/624489251024797696/i-like-to-believe-jgy-really-did-love-qin-su
Mostly by this bit:
Sure, we can say that Meng Yao needed Jin Guangshan for social advancement, but after his father gave him the Jin name, what further use was there of Jin Guangshan? What honour, what favour, what recognition could Meng Yao not have gotten from Jin Zixuan instead? Though the story went into a bit of a different direction on me. ^_^

It's a really fun analysis, go give it a read. ^_^

column4: The AU where Jiang Cheng dies at Nightless City instead of Jiang Yanli and she takes her son to raise at Lotus Pier. She and Lan Wangji bond over losing Wei Wuxian and raising their children, and over time, they start to have suspicions about what happened at Qiongqi Way....
column6:
Yes hello everybody who is in the mood for some ANGST but also sweet JYL + LWJ bonding over their shared grief and raising kids together

Warnings: Obviously all the bad things that happen in canon, plus an additional warning for negative portrayals of the Lan sect because sometimes they are big jerks. Lan Wangji’s punishment of 33 lashes plays a big role in the fic. It’s never really clearly explained in the show (like, he got 300 strikes with a bastinado but has whip scars??? And for what, exactly, just … being rude to Su She or something? ‘Making a big fuss’ according to the translation on Netflix?) so I kind of mashed a little bit of book canon into it, to make it make more sense.

I’m sure I have a white girl’s understanding of ancient Chinese inheritance law for which I am sorry. I know that in canon, Jin Ling could only be the heir to the Yunmeng Jiang if he renounced his claim on Jinlintai, but I’m a bit fuzzier on what would happen if Jiang Yanli survived and brought him back to Lotus Pier. Please forgive me for any errors.

There will be some LXC + original female character in an ‘arranged marriage of convenience’ setting, because the historian in me cannot believe that none of these sect leaders are being pressured to get married lmao. It’s not romantic and in fact LXC is aro-ace in this fic because aro-ace LXC waters my crops.

I’m using the name Yu Zixia for Madam Jin in this fic – Xia (霞) for ‘afterglow of a rising or setting sun’ which I just thought sounded really pretty and also vaguely ominous.

column4:
After blowing up a nation, Wilbur throws a sword down at his father's feet and begs to be killed.

Phil, however, takes one look at the state of his children and decides he has other plans.

(post november 16th au where wilbur doesn't die. instead a family leaves the smp entirely, and learn how to live with each other again.)

"Fuck, I - I can't forgive either of you right now," Tommy says quietly. Despite the words, he hugs Wilbur tighter. "One day, though. I think one day I will."

"And we're still brothers, right?" Wilbur dares ask. Techno inhales sharply beside him.

They get a choked laugh in reply.

"Yeah. Brothers."
column7:
Note that this is set in a universe that, while it has Minecraft elements like the End and Nether dimensions and some items from Minecraft, doesn't operate on its logic (ie no respawns, no carrying ridiculous amounts of items in an inventory, no weird health regeneration rules, no weird gravity, ect). Think of it as sort of a fantasy world, which includes animals, plants, and just generally stuff outside Minecraft.

(i reply to comments live! twitch

tumblr and twitter for questions and art!)

I am a sucker for three things: Found family being family, running away to live on a farm, and GETTING SOME GODDAMN THERAPY. So these things will happen here, though the farm part will take another chapter or two to get going.

Also, I’m more used to writing in past tense so if you see any grammatical mistakes at all feel free to let me know and I will fix it! Aside from that, comments and constructive criticism are always welcome (I dearly hope I haven't made a huge mistake by starting another longfic).

column2: those hands pulled me from the earth
column4:
Shang Qinghua had known that things would play out exactly like this, almost like he’d seen it before.

Like he’d planned it.

Shang Qinghua’s words from their first meeting, his declaration as the creator of this universe, rings loudly in Mobei Jun’s ears.

Shang Qinghua is not just an ordinary god, sent to experience tribulations in the mortal realm.

Shang Qinghua is more than that, so much more than that, and-

He has chosen Mobei Jun.

(Or, the one where Mobei Jun thinks Shang Qinghua is a god.)
column6:
MBJ needed a name for the first two parts, so I decided to call him Mobei Yi (义 for loyalty/righteousness).

Title is Hozier.
column7:
bonus:

a couple of years down the track, when plots start to diverge so far from canon that sqh cannot predict them anymore, mbj will look at him with concern in his eyes, and ask if sqh is being punished for marrying a demon.

sqh asks for a timeout during the ensuing (very surreal) conversation, and leaves the northern palace. mbj chases after him only to figure everything is fine when he hears sqh yelling "HE THINKS I'M A GOD HE THINKS HIS DEMON DICK HAS RUINED MY GODHOOD" and sqq cackling really loudly from his room in qing jing peak.

As usual, I'm here on Tumblr, come say hi! :D

column4: Faced with an eternity without his brother, Loki strikes a bargain to change the past. Post TDW.
column6:
This story was originally posted to AO3 on December 29, 2013, shortly after The Dark World came out in theaters. Before this fanfic was removed from this site, it had somewhere around 10,000 kudos and thousands of comments.

I'm reposting it upon request. One chapter will go up each day in December until completed. (Happy Holidays!) There are 26 chapters total, and don't worry. The fanfic won't disappear again. (It's a long story about why it was deleted in the first place, and I don't want to get into it, please. It really upsets me.)

You can also find me at my new social media accounts:
Tumblr: proantagonista (formerly pro-antagonist and borntomake)
Twitter: proantagonista
Instagram: proantagonista

 
Original story notes and warnings:

Violence, language, green-eyed snarkiness with a substantial bit of crazy. You know. The good stuff.

The summary implies a character death, so I feel I should include that in the warning section. But the summary also speaks of Loki's intent to see the past changed. That being said, there are plenty of brotherly feels (the non-slashy kind) to be had in this story. Worry not, Thor fans.

column4:
‘You’re a villain’, echoed through Hitoshi’s head. 

They also think he’s the traitor. But what had he done that made them believe that? He was so confused. Everything was fine last night before his parents left. They had hugged the two of them goodbye before they left, promising they’d be safe. Telling him and Eri that they loved them. 

His dad- could he even call him that anymore?- grabbed him by the arm and made him stand, glaring heavily at him. 

“You aren’t my child,” he hissed, “neither of you. And you are going to regret ever being here.” 

Hitoshi felt as if someone had ripped out his heart and stepped on it. What had he done that was so bad?

 

Or Alternatively: Hitoshi is accused of being a villain, which leads to a terrible confrontation between Aizawa, Hizashi, and Hitoshi, and it brings back some awful memories and insecurities Hitoshi hasn’t had in years. All while trying to protect his little sister.

title inspired by the song Young Blood by Noah Kahan

column4:
Deku’s bedroom’s about the same as Katsuki imagined it. He perches on the edge of the absurdly soft bed, trying not to think about Aunty Inko staring at him like he had two heads. "Why’d you come, Kacchan? Is everything okay?”

“I’m sorry,” Katsuki says without preamble. Just like he rehearsed on the way over here. “I’ve been an asshole for most of our lives and you didn’t deserve that.”

“I, uhm –”

“You’re way too fucking sweet for your own good. You should have kicked me out instead of letting me in your room. You shouldn’t have –” kissed me, he doesn’t say. “Been nice to me after I was a jerk. I shouldn’t have been a jerk. I never even noticed how much I liked having you around until I left.”

“You liked having me around?” Deku asks, expression going soft. Katsuki rubs his sweaty hands on his jeans. Slowly, Deku scoots forward in his chair until their knees almost touch. “Is that why you started talking to me again, Kacchan? I wondered if maybe you were just bored but I thought – I’d hoped maybe you finally wanted to be friends.”

Katsuki’s chest clenches. “I did. I do.”

(Katsuki moves to Tokyo after middle school. Izuku, against all odds, ends up going with him.)
column7:
did katsuki toss that gakuran button somewhere and forget about it until it suddenly became Relevant? or did he hide it away in a safe corner and look at it from time to time? he won't tell. i'll leave it to you to decide.

in this timeline i think the sludge villain incident never happened, or maybe deku met all might and was told he probably couldn't become a hero. it's a little bittersweet. rest assured, though, that in the future deku WILL become a successful manga artist and have more money and fans than pro hero bakugou could ever hope to achieve. bakugou wants to be jealous but deku's so sweet and humble it's impossible. it also helps that a) deku's still his number one fan and b) deku won't admit this but bakugou's SURE the main character was based off of him (he's right. deku just won't admit this because he draws the MC with gigantic pecs rip)

anyway we're nearing the end of the year, finally. i feel like it went past without me really doing anything. every day drags on forever but the months slip away... let's hope january is a little better.

as always please leave a comment if you like. thanks for reading and have a good weekend!

column6: I read a bunch of fics/posts about how Order 6 is "destroy all communication devices as fast as possible" and thought, "huh, you know what's even better? If standing orders after Order 6 are that Clones had to protect Jedi commanders as quickly as possible because Palpatine wanted to look like he cares about the Jedi in front of the Senate when the GAR was introduced."

column4:
It wasn’t that Jin Zixuan didn’t love his mother – he did, he truly did. He loved her, he supported her, he stood by her side in every argument. He would do anything within his power to help her get everything that she wanted.

It was only that he took a very reasonable look at the circumstances and realized he couldn’t. He couldn’t get her the one thing she’d always counted for.

He couldn’t win the right of succession to be Sect Leader Jin.

column4:
It is meant to be simple, but nothing ever is when it comes to the twisted tangled thread of fate which ensnares a small number.

Haruno Sakura dies.

That is meant to be the end of it all, but that’s not quite the truth. Haruno Sakura dies, yes, but that is not where her tale ends. Rather, that is where it all begins – the beginning of a strange adventure all of her own. Haruno Sakura dies a bloody death, in a grey world marred by war where man kills man, each fighting for their own beliefs, and she is subsequently made anew in a world where the boundaries between good and evil are so clearly defined.

Ever there is a question resounding in her mind—

“Oh Child of War, will you ever know peace?”
column6:
Well...

I meant to keep this back till I had more chapters, but it's becoming fairly obvious I have no such self-control when it comes to posting fanfiction... Anyway, despite the growing number of WIPs I have, I hope you'll enjoy this, despite the sporadic updates it'll have. I have a desire to finish all my works but my brain is being eaten by LOTR/Naruto crossovers, so I'm focusing on them for a little while.

The plot bunnies have been attacking with vengeance.

It's yet another LOTR/Naruto crossover with that same pairing which is still eating at me so, and more to the point, it's the one where I try to write some delightful slow burn that exceeds 100k words. Yay. So you've got that to look forwards to, as well as me fleshing out as many OCs as I can, given it's a long while yet before we meet any of the canon set.

I'm also working now, which slows down updates for all my works even further...

column2: I was a kid in the village, doing alright, then I became a prince overnight
column4:
(Yes the title is from sofia the first, yes I'm laughing at it, I find it funny-)

In which Phil has created the Antarctic Empire from the ground up and takes in Techno and Wilbur along the way, and raises them while also ruling his kingdom. Tommy, sixteen, lives with Tubbo in an orphanage, the two of them running around in the cold streets of their town.

After a hectic day of getting separated from Tubbo, getting into a few fights, and ending up in an entirely new town, he comes across Phil, and saves him from an assassination attempt by smashing a plate over someone's head.

So then both Techno and Wilbur decide to see who this kid is, and Tommy sure is endearing, in the way that the first time they spy on him, he starts a fight in an alleyway over a bag of cookies.

(and then Tommy basically gets kidnapped into the royal family, but like, legally, y’know?)

column4:
Argus' life was a largely thankless one (unless you counted the thanks of the paintings he maintained), working on keeping a thousand year old castle from falling down around the ears of students who didn't care. He had his cat, his work, his books, and a constant boil of self hatred and resentment to get him by.

And then a sixth year handed him a letter from her aunt, thanking him for acting as conservator of Hogwarts and calling him Dr. Filch. It was the first time he had been called Doctor since he started at the castle. He had little choice but to write back, after that.
column6:
There's a tumblr post I can't find right now about how Filch HAS to be the conservationist of Hogwarts (which he is) and I kept thinking of him as Madame Michel from "The Elegance of the Hedgehog" by Muriel Barbery and so here we are.
When does this take place in relation to canon? I have absolutely no idea.

This was also written and finished about a week before my grandmother passed away, in early June, and I put this away because the timing made me think of that and it hurt too much. Gramma Jo was practical and warm and introduced me to Daphne du Maurier's work and would listen to me talk about art history even though it wasn't so much her thing. So this is dedicated to her. Love you, Gramma.

column4:
As Jason laid in the wreckage of an explosion of his own making with a bleeding neck —he never expected the batarang slicing his throat wide open— and broken body, remembering how Bruce chose the Joker over him, he just wanted to laugh at himself.

Because how could he ever expect anything different?

Nobody cared about Jason Todd. He was just a Crime Alley fuck up. He wasn’t worth a damn. He wasn’t worth anything. He should’ve known better. He did know better. He just… wished that someone would pick him for once.

.

When Bruce cut Jason’s throat with a batarang to stop him from killing the Joker, it damaged his vocal chords so badly that he could no longer talk. But Jason didn’t care anymore. He’s finally realized that no one wants to listen to what a dead man has to say.

column2: area cryptid upset no one bothered to inform him of his tragic backstory
column4:
“My life is a nightmare,” Dabi muttered blankly.

“Nah, this is hilarious,” Hawks said, and while he wasn’t explicitly laughing, Dabi knew that those weird little chirps he was letting out were pointed at him. “Imagine if we go through all this effort and you don’t even have some sort of dramatic background or tragic backstory to justify you being this emo, you’re just a hot topic junkie or something.”

“That’s fucking worse.”

Or,

Dabi has amnesia and keeps reading conspiracy theories about himself in an attempt to figure out who he is, gets the League in on it, and they dismantle organized crime, revolutionize society, and ravage the hero system in the process. Hawks suffers.

column4:
Percy finally has a friend who is completely and entirely normal. Someone around whom he doesn't have to be a demigod hero. Carter Kane is about as mortal as they come, and Percy intends to keep his secret from his new friend for as long as he can.

Carter finally has a friend entirely unrelated to the magical side of his life. Someone he doesn't have to share with Sadie or save the world with. Percy Jackson is the furthest thing from a magician, and Carter is determined to keep Percy very separate from any and all mythology.

--

Or: Two idiots try to protect each other from the dangerous magical aspects of their double-lives without realizing that the other is just as wrapped up in crazy mythological stuff as they are. And maybe they end up falling in love somewhere along the way.
column6:
I did my best to make it clear who's POV it was just through the writing, and I divided the POVs up by centered lines, but feel free to let me know if it's confusing! POVs that change this frequently can get confusing for me when I'm reading sometimes, so let me know if there's anything I can do to make it clearer for you :)

Anyway hi im andy im autistic and ive been reverting to my middle school self by deeply, intensely, insatiably hyperfixating on the riordanverse for like a week and a half

i started 3 fics and one of them has over 30k words and this one is almost 20k because when i get hyperfixated i start churning fics out like a goddamn machine!!!!!

I think that the "two superpowered people in a relationship who each think the other is perfectly normal and are each desperately trying to keep their identities secret" is one of the funniest and most underrated tropes there is. There was a version of this fic that turned super angsty for no reason but i scrapped it and wrote this instead. i dont do snapshots a lot, i tend to go for straight-up narrative, so this was a challenge for me.

i recognize the audience for this ship is super niche and i absolutely refuse to apologize for writing this, it needed to exist. I do, however, feel obligated to make it known that im a percabeth stan first and a human being second. i'm nothing if not a multishipper, though, and i do really like carter and percy. like that dynamic is really freaking good

also don't think too hard abt the artifacts i mentioned in the museums or abt the way percy and carter describe the mythology stuff. i did very little research and it's all sorta hand-wavy anyway. the kane chronicles is my favorite riordanverse series but its been like three years since i actually read it so like! i might get stuff wrong. thats ok tho all is well i swear
column7:
contact me on tumblr @aguecheek!! feel free to dm me or send an ask i promise im not scary

drop a comment or a kudos if you feel like it, no pressure, I'm not expecting a ton of anything on this one bc i know its not in any kind of high demand. i wanted it to exist, so i wrote it, and my job is done, and i can leave it at that

Thank u all so much for dropping by, and let me know if you, for any reason. want to see any more out of this story/universe/wahtever

see yall later :)!

column4:
“Not a big talker, hm?” Wei Ying tilts his head to one side. “That’s okay, I’ve been told I’m a good enough conversationalist for three. My tongue is multi-talented and—”

He has just enough time to feel her palm on the back of his neck and think, oh, her hands are so big, before his words are being stolen into her mouth.
column6:
Loosely inspired by this conversation with Betsy on twitter. Be the change you want to see in the world, etc. but it’s me saying I want more Wei Ying comphet-then-fucked-into-admitting-he’s-a-needy-pillow-princess content.

Title from Blister In The Sun, which is a WangXian song for me specifically because this line always makes me cackle. There are too many em dashes in here. I will make no apologies for them, on account of Wei Ying.exe no longer working.

Thank you to Peach and Trisha for looking this over for me!!! Your comments both helped me and also made me laugh, which was extremely appreciated.

Bear in mind the tags, specifically relating to dubious consent, reluctance, and internalized homophobia. Both our participants are very into the proceedings from start to finish, whether Wei Ying can admit to it or not, but if any of that will be triggering for you or upset you, this is definitely not the fic for you! Sexual content takes place between teens who are 18 years of age.

column2: Aliens, Hammers, and Making a Memorable First Impression
column4:
"Wow, dude, this thing is awesome. Does it generate its own electricity?" Peter flipped the hammer once in the air and caught it, watching in amazement as sparks danced over it. "Like, I know you're the god of thunder, but I didn't know your hammer had magic powers too! That is so cool. I want one. Like, I won't get it, obviously, 'cause I don't want to steal your thunder—no pun intended.”

He grinned at his totally-intended pun, but Thor didn't react. Not even a twitch of the lips.

“Okay, yeah, that was a dumb joke,” Peter admitted. “Sorry. Here's your hammer, Mr. Thor.” He held out the weapon to its rightful owner.

Thor just stared.

 

(Peter Parker meets Thor for the first time. It does not go as expected.)

column4:
Nie Mingjue arranges for Meng Yao to stay at Cloud Recesses for the lectures.

Meng Yao looked away, trying to figure out the words to convey how confused he was by the last few weeks of events. But then, he thought, this was like Nie Mingjue in temperament. He still vividly remembered the day he had gone from ‘carrying water for ungrateful assholes’ to ‘vice-general’ in the space of two minutes.

Looking somewhat amused, Lan Xichen said, “I’ve found over the years that Mingjue-xiong will occasionally make an assumption or a decision and then act on it, forgetting that the rest of us aren’t mind-readers, and if he doesn’t tell us what he’s doing, we won’t know.”

 

Featuring: WWX as a chaos gremlin, NHS matchmaking, MY befuddled by praise, JZX being mocked for his uselessness, JC who is Not With These Idiots, and LQR grateful to have at least ONE student actually interested in learning.
column6:
Have lots of people written fics where Meng Yao gets to stay at Cloud Recesses for the lectures? Yup! Am I gonna write one more? Yup!

This is my first 3zun fic! It focuses more on the Xiyao for the first third, then the Nieyao for the second third, and then both. Less of the Nielan aspect, but it’s mostly just because of where all the characters are during plot stuff, not because they’re less ‘together’ in any sense.

Anyway time for a nice self-indulgent AU where everyone gets to be happy to balance out the other fic I’m writing right now haha.

column4:
So, it turns out that saving the king’s life during a battle is a move straight out of a classic ballad. No, seriously. Fairytales, legends and romances too, it's grist for all their mills. This makes no sense to Castiel, but as a fallen angel who’s only been human for a few days, everything about these mortals and their 'romance' is perplexing.

Fortunately king Dean does not know it was Castiel who saved his life, and the latter intends to keep it that way. The idea of a one-sided bond of gratitude between them is… unappealing. He prefers his sacrifice to remain unrequited. Dean’s still searching for his savior, and hell, the whole kingdom believes this person is his predestined love interest, but that’s not an issue. It’s not like someone else is going to pop out of the woodwork to claim responsibility for Castiel’s good deed.
column6:
Joyful hodgepodge mess of early middle ages slash fantasy universe, so the Pope and the Holy Roman Empire coexist with a made-up kingdom of Lawrence, there's angels, demons and magic alongside Jerusalem and the Crusaders - you want it, you got it, just toss it in the blender.

There's world building and plot and stuff, but this story is 90% about the romance. It's got a surprising amount of Angry!Cas in it for a romance (I blame 2020), but yes, it is a romance. Enjoy ~

column4: Fresh from high school and still reeling from the death of Shirakumo, Eraserhead stops on an unassuming fire escape. Little does he know, he is about to acquire his very first fan, a fan who will change his life for the better...
column7:

When Mic found out, he declared it a sign from fate that they were meant to be a family. Also he probably got through two boxes of tissues.

After the Sunshot Campaign, Jin Guangshan arranges a marriage between Jin Guangyao and Nie Mingjue to increase his influence within the cultivation world speculating that Nie Mingjue won't refuse. If a rift between Qinghe Nie and Gusu Lan can be created with it, even better.
Or so Jin Guangshan had at least hoped. But somehow, Nie Mingjue and Jin Guangyao manage to sort out their past with the help of Lan Xichen (and maybe Nie Huaisang, but nobody quite knows about that).

column4:
Airplane-Bro, a spy for the Demon Realm, may have accidentally helped set the end of the world in motion and comes to his best friend Cucumber-Bro, a librarian for Cang Qiong Mountain Sect, for help in preventing it.

A Good Omens Fusion AU.
column6:
Again, I love "Comfort Movie/Book of Choice" Fusion AUs and I felt like there could be some very fun ones for SVSSS. Thank you to halfcrazedandrogynouswizard for mentioning Good Omens! Again, I've seen the show more recently than I've read the book, but this is a VERY loose AU, so I think it should be fine.

This is not a direct AU in which I match each SVSSS character to a Good Omens character. This is a fusion of the SVSSS and the Good Omens worlds and plots. You do not need to have read (or watched) Good Omens to read this. It stands alone.

This marks the first time I've written the Cucumberplane friendship!

Enjoy! 😇😈
column7:
- In the last one I was like, "Well, Airplane HAS to be a god equivalent if someone is going to be." But the thing about Good Omens (the book) is that God is absent/silent while this "Great Plan" is happening and then failing to happen (not at all like the Chronicles of Narnia), and Airplane as a Crowley equivalent seemed like a MUCH funnier prospect. So, in this, Airplane and Shen Yuan are Crowley and Aziraphale equivalents (although Airplane and Mobei-Jun are ALSO Crowley and Aziraphale equivalents here). I couldn't resist the opportunity to write Cucumberplane dealing with this.

- So, this marks the first time I've written the Cucumberplane friendship! (Shen Yuan has options for a best friend in this universe, but he's like, "No, I want the dumpster fire with dubious morals.") It also marks the first time that I've written Ming Fan and Ning Yingying, which was also very exciting.

- In an AU with modern AND magical medical care, the moms live! The world is saved and the war to end all wars is averted by Binghe's moms saying that he's not allowed to be the Last Emperor, the Destroyer of Kings, Conqueror of the Eternal Abyss, Prince of this World, and Lord of Darkness until he finishes school/training. Yes, Binghe knows he's a half-demon here. (Offscreen: those demon-detecting flowers burst into flames and Binghe grabbed them and booked it for the dumpster behind the Cang Qiong Mountain Sect library.)

Demon Lords: "Come with us and rule both the Demon and Human Realms!"
LBH: "Let me ask my moms first."
Demon Lords: "What?"
LBH: "My moms said no."

- This was fun! I pretty much just wanted to write Cucumberplane panicking. Shen Yuan has not yet realized that Binghe is the child they're looking for; he's just realized, "Oh, fuck, there was a third baby! And where's the original mom?!"

- Bye! 😘💕❤️
column9:
Again, I love "Comfort Movie/Book of Choice" Fusion AUs and I felt like there could be some very fun ones for SVSSS. Thank you to halfcrazedandrogynouswizard for mentioning Good Omens! Again, I've seen the show more recently than I've read the book, but this is a VERY loose AU, so I think it should be fine.

This is not a direct AU in which I match each SVSSS character to a Good Omens character. This is a fusion of the SVSSS and the Good Omens worlds and plots. You do not need to have read (or watched) Good Omens to read this. It stands alone.

This marks the first time I've written the Cucumberplane friendship!

Enjoy! 😇😈
column10:
- In the last one I was like, "Well, Airplane HAS to be a god equivalent if someone is going to be." But the thing about Good Omens (the book) is that God is absent/silent while this "Great Plan" is happening and then failing to happen (not at all like the Chronicles of Narnia), and Airplane as a Crowley equivalent seemed like a MUCH funnier prospect. So, in this, Airplane and Shen Yuan are Crowley and Aziraphale equivalents (although Airplane and Mobei-Jun are ALSO Crowley and Aziraphale equivalents here). I couldn't resist the opportunity to write Cucumberplane dealing with this.

- So, this marks the first time I've written the Cucumberplane friendship! (Shen Yuan has options for a best friend in this universe, but he's like, "No, I want the dumpster fire with dubious morals.") It also marks the first time that I've written Ming Fan and Ning Yingying, which was also very exciting.

- In an AU with modern AND magical medical care, the moms live! The world is saved and the war to end all wars is averted by Binghe's moms saying that he's not allowed to be the Last Emperor, the Destroyer of Kings, Conqueror of the Eternal Abyss, Prince of this World, and Lord of Darkness until he finishes school/training. Yes, Binghe knows he's a half-demon here. (Offscreen: those demon-detecting flowers burst into flames and Binghe grabbed them and booked it for the dumpster behind the Cang Qiong Mountain Sect library.)

Demon Lords: "Come with us and rule both the Demon and Human Realms!"
LBH: "Let me ask my moms first."
Demon Lords: "What?"
LBH: "My moms said no."

- This was fun! I pretty much just wanted to write Cucumberplane panicking. Shen Yuan has not yet realized that Binghe is the child they're looking for; he's just realized, "Oh, fuck, there was a third baby! And where's the original mom?!"

- Bye! 😘💕❤️

column2: Change fate by being aggressively kind
column4:
“You do understand that you’re caring for the thing meant to bring destruction and chaos to our world, right?” The woman asks, Phil looking behind him fondly as Techno grabs at the ends of his wings.

“He’s just a child.” Phil answers distractedly, humming as his wings get gently yanked at.

“He’s the first of three to destroy life as we know it! Shouldn’t we, well, get rid of him?!”

“Oh, no.” Phil raises his eyes with a sharp glare. “Believe me, I have my own way of preventing the apocalypse.”

---

Or, Techno, Wilbur, and Tommy are basically chaotic forces of nature, destined from birth to end the world and bring destruction. Most who hear of the tale of them are trying their best to track them down, and to end the monsters while they’re still young, still just children.

Phil has a different plan.

(In which Phil raises the minecraft equivalents of the anti-christ with love and support, so much so to the point where the world ending is really just a funny thought, and Phil has three kids who casually have powers that are bit more extreme than anything else in the world)
column6:
I had an idea where Phil is like, living his life out in the Minecraft world, just chilling, and he still gets his chaotic kids, but he acquires them through the fact that everyone else is like “these children are so goddamn destructive”

Then I was like, “What if Phil basically just stops armageddon by being a Dad” and here we are.

Enjoy :)

column4:
"Tim turned to leave, and nearly fell over when a faint hacking sound made him want to jump out of his skin.

Spinning around had him coming face to face, with what he had previously assumed was a snow covered trash bag or something, shaking with the force of the sickly coughs it was generating.

Something- no, SOMEONE was alive under the mound of snow!"

Or

Tim goes out to photograph Batman & Robin, and comes home with a frozen stranger instead.

column6:
OKAY. So I finally experienced one of those rare moments, where my motivation to write AND free time to write actually lined up.

And oh boy!

What started out as a small hurt/comfort fic about Jason getting Hypothermia, evolved into whatever THIS is.

This fic is dedicated to envysparkler and iselsis who post a lot of amazing works, and always kindly reply to my comments. (Or at least envy does, iselsis likes to rag on me for the ostrich thing, but they will not break me!)

I have decided to combine together their two favorite concepts, them being, Tim & Jason being Bros and Bruce rescuing/adopting kids, but neglecting to tell them this ahead of time, so they mistakenly assume they have been kidnapped.

The results of this, being the pure insanity of: Tim rescuing Jason, but neglecting to tell him this ahead of time, so he mistakenly assume he's been kidnapped. Angst & hilarity ensue.

I don't know the chapter count, but I'd say 2 or 3 chapters is a good guess. If you find any mistakes feel free to comment down below, and big thanks to my friend Just_Another_Angsty_Geek for helping me edit.

ALSO: I wrote this a few days ago, and just haven't gotten around to posting it. And then I saw today that iselsis, one of the people I WROTE this for, posted a fic with basically the same core concept. I haven't read it yet, but it looks like the fics have different enough (I hope) executions. So when you get this iselsis. This was a complete COINCIDENCE, and I didn't plagiarize your work, to re-gift it back to you.

LMAO

column2: you still eat away at me
column4:
Eleven years after losing touch with his former boarding school roommate, Shang Qinghua encounters him in a bar, all grown up and in need of his help.

He's a simple man. From the moment he said yes, he should have known he didn't stand a chance.
column6:
This work was created for the MXTX Mini Bang! Thank you so much to my incredible artist, Geve, who drew one of the first Mobei Jun art pieces I ever saw in this fandom, and was therefore a huge part of the reason I ever read Scum Villain to begin with. It is genuinely incredible to me to think that, by happenstance, I got paired with you, but I couldn't be happier, you were such a joy to work with, thank you from the bottom of my heart!

Thank you also to Fern, whose comments on this fic made me laugh every time I opened it and got me through a lot of struggling; to Claire, for hyping every snippet I sent even with almost nothing to go on; and to Jordan, whose advice I only halfway took even though it was excellent and perfect advisement.

Kingdom is a made up company with a made up business structure. Mobei Jun is a totally normal name for a human to have in this universe. Somehow.

Title is taken from a quote by Margarita Karapanou, tr. by Karen Emmerich from Rien ne va Plus:

 

You still eat away at me, more and more, insatiably. I’m stupid, I let you do it. But you’re stupid, too.
column7:
This fic has been converted for free using AOYeet!

No one is ever super clear on what Shang Qinghua's job at Kingdom is, but everyone's too scared of Mobei Jun to really question it, and he does it well... whatever it is.

This fic AND ART is retweetable, and retweets/comments are the best way to let me know if you enjoyed yourself, as well as spreading Geve's excellent work!

column4:
EDUCATIONAL DECREE #30
All magical children aged between 11 and 17 from the year 2000 onwards must obtain a graduation diploma to be considered Of Age and eligible for employment and independent living.
Signed. Delores Umbridge, Hogwarts Headmistress

With no directive over where an education must be obtained, Harry put forward the considerable coffers of the Black Family fortune and paid for hundreds of surviving Hogwarts students to flee the UK and set up elsewhere in the world, refusing to fall under the sway of a woman who delighted in torturing children. In choosing his new home and education, Harry selected a place directly on the otherside of the planet, as far away as physically possible - Namimori, Japan.

He had no intention, or idea, that his first day at school would be such a debacle - or the beginning of the rest of his life.
column7:
Reighost literally launched this plotbunny at my face back in November, I've been working at it on and off over the last two months and it's kinda been chewing on me for the last few days, hard enough that I actually wanted to post it despite vowing to never return to the KHR fandom.

Hopefully its less of a toxic cesspit on AO3 than it was on ffnet. I poured eight years into this fandom, and I've been kind of drifting around since I left without really finding another place since. Fingers crossed this is more like wearing a pair of comfy old slippers, instead of several sizes too small pinchy school shoes XDD;;

“I’ve made my choice, System.” Shen Yuan says finally. “Option Three! Option Three please!”

“Is that a Lock?”

What is this, a game show? Shen Yuan grumbles to himself. “Yes, Option Three. Lock please.”

====================

After dying, Shen Yuan is given the option to choose his difficulty mode. Naturally, being the pragmatic person he is, he chooses the Easy Mode.

It's not as easy as he thinks...

column4:
Xue Yang runs into an old friend. Jin Guangyao runs into a man he thought was dead. Xiao Xingchen is concerned for his friend's safety. Lan Xichen would like to know what the fuck is going on here, but he's not going to ask.

Or: the one with the unexpected double-date where every person involved is having a very different experience.
column6:
Last fic of 2020!

So once upon a time I was talking with Amelia and James and someone went "what if Xiyao and Xuexiao double date though" and I, fool that I am, went "if you help me figure out how to make it happen I will write that, because sounds like fun."

This is the result! It requires a little squinting and suspension of disbelief, but I did end up having fun. The important thing here is that no one here is stupid; just two of them are ignoring some things for their own reasons. The title comes from the excellent song "True Love" by ThouShaltNot, specifically the lyric: And we'll toast to a lifetime of happiness / And we'll catch up on mutual friends / And we'll laugh with good cheer and not mention that we're / Just a means to each of our ends.

Great big thanks to Amelia for beta-ing work, James for brainstorming help, and Misha for last minute help filling in some important holes.

Come say hi on Tumblr.

Edit: There is now wonderful ART by sabigawa of one very awkward double date dinner!
column9:
Last fic of 2020!

So once upon a time I was talking with Amelia and James and someone went "what if Xiyao and Xuexiao double date though" and I, fool that I am, went "if you help me figure out how to make it happen I will write that, because sounds like fun."

This is the result! It requires a little squinting and suspension of disbelief, but I did end up having fun. The important thing here is that no one here is stupid; just two of them are ignoring some things for their own reasons. The title comes from the excellent song "True Love" by ThouShaltNot, specifically the lyric: And we'll toast to a lifetime of happiness / And we'll catch up on mutual friends / And we'll laugh with good cheer and not mention that we're / Just a means to each of our ends.

Great big thanks to Amelia for beta-ing work, James for brainstorming help, and Misha for last minute help filling in some important holes.

Come say hi on Tumblr.

Edit: There is now wonderful ART by sabigawa of one very awkward double date dinner!

column4:
“Spit it out,” said Mobei Jun impatiently.
“It’s just—the only, um, method of reversing this curse that I know of would be very unpleasant for you! Extremely unpleasant! You’d probably want to avoid it at all costs! So I think the best course of action would be for me to do a little more additional research to see if I can find another way that would be less, um, personally distasteful for you, my King. That is, of course, assuming that being trapped in this lowly servant’s body isn’t already too distasteful to bear?”
“Tell me what your ‘method’ entails and I will make a decision,” said Mobei Jun.

aka, Mobei Jun touches an object that curses he and Shang Qinghua to swap bodies.

column2: a micro utopia born as the overture plays
column4:
Lan Xichen pauses before he speaks. He often does. “A-Yao, will you…?”

There are any number of things that Lan Xichen might be about to say. He might be about to say, “A-Yao, will you cook breakfast while I bathe in the river?” But then, there is a gravity to his tone, and a flush on his cheeks. So perhaps it will be, “A-Yao, will you do that thing with your tongue?” Or even more thrillingly, “A-Yao, will you teach me how to do that thing with your tongue?”

Lan Xichen does not say any of these things. He says, “A-Yao, will you marry me? If we both survive the war, will you marry me?”

.

Lan Xichen proposes before the war. Somehow, through the property of transitivity, Wei Wuxian becomes Meng Yao’s problem to solve.

column4:
“You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed.”
/////

“So,” Techoblade says, slow and deliberate, his face shows clearly just how unbelievable he finds all of this, “you saw a boy last night, in the middle of the night, living with raccoons and eating our garbage?”

“I know how insane it sounds,” Phil says, “but I know what I saw. We need to help him, who knows how long he’s been out here?”

“Okay,” Wilbur interrupts, “let’s say that raccoon-boy is real. What is it you want us to do? We can’t go searching the woods for specific bunch of raccoons, I don’t know if you’ve noticed Phil but there are a lot of them out there.”

“Going out and hunting him isn’t going to get us anywhere,” Techno says, “we have to let the raccoon-boy come to us. He’s already come once, you know how tenacious raccoons are. If they came to the garbage pit once, they’ll come again. We just have to set a trap.”

“Those raccoons aren’t gonna know what fucking hit them,” Wilbur mutters.

Or: RaccoonInnit taken well beyond its logical conclusion

column4: Luo Binghe's time in the demon realm is fraught with struggles, but none more than the constant struggle he has about who he's meant to become. There are so many choices to make, so many paths to take and he wonders if the path he choses will lead him back to his most important person.
column6:
Hey guys! Another short!
This time from Binghe's POV during the separation down in the demon realm.

Once again, this assumes that you've read A Pairing of Souls. If not, you might be kind of confused.
column7:
Hope you enjoyed it!

So, I've been asked about Shen Yuan's new 'Palace Master Look' and I'll be honest that I have very few images in mind but there is this one, and so I figured I'd share it. If there are any others, I'll add them for you all if you'd like!

[https://64.media.tumblr.com/894141a529f1351df38273aec97d8d78/tumblr_pka969lQrs1uocgm5o2_640.jpg]

I do see that Binghe has a better chance at getting his feet under him in healthier ways since in this universe he only obsessed over the corpse for 35 days instead of 5 years and he didn't ever get to the 'lets punish myself in the dreamscape' point. Plus he's not suffered under Xin Mo's influence for as long. So he's in a much better place than SVSSS Binghe at this point.

column4:
“I understand. You heard the place you loved was in trouble, so you came back, but I don’t—I just—why didn’t you take me?” Here it was, at last. Catharsis, or something close to it. “I would have hunted them down with you, Philza, the people who did that to your town. I would have given you your vengeance on a silver platter. I would have given you the world.”

Philza didn’t look guilty. He just looked tired. “I didn’t hunt them down, though.”

//

Or, that fic where Techno and Phil are old immortals, and Tommy and Wilbur are decidedly... not.

column4:
Luo Binghe returns to Cang Qiong Mountain with a grievously injured Shen Qingqiu.

The trouble is, it's the wrong Shen Qingqiu.

AKA The original Shen Qingqiu gets a happy ending, whether he likes it or not.
column6:
Please understand, this story is utterly self-indulgent fix-it fic. This started more or less as a series of scenes from an AU me and my friend Chira have been batting around for some time now. But eventually I wrote enough of them it had some semblance of a story. I hope you enjoy it as much as we did.

With, obviously, thanks to Chira for shamelessly enabling this story and inspiring more scenarios for it as it went on.

column4:
"The… party, sir?"

Cody had that sinking feeling again.

"Oh right!" Skywalker said, and then leapt up onto a crate to address the gathered men. "Alright troopers, consider yourselves on leave for the next 30 hour rotation!" he shouted, to cheers from the men. "Now," at that, he dramatically ripped his tunics open. Rex made a choking noise next to Cody’s ear.

"LETS FUCKING PARTY!"

They're all going to die, Cody thought.

column4:
In a world where you can hear whatever your soulmate sings, it can be pretty hard to get work done. Or focus. Or fall asleep.

But it’s not all bad.

Aka: 5 times that the sbi soulmates were annoyed and one time they weren’t (except the entire fic is horrendously fluffy and on the verge of a crackfic)

column4: The pictures leak on a lazy off-season Sunday, in that muddled bit of midafternoon Clint never knows what to do with when he isn’t training. He curls up with Lucky on the couch and naps through the end of his whole damn life. And that, honestly, is pretty much perfect.

column4:
Meng Yao is well aware of why someone like him would be dating Lan Xichen and Nie Mingjue. He’s a dimpled placeholder for Nie Mingjue with the added bonus of easy threesomes.
The problem is, Mingjue and Xichen don’t seem to understand this.

Nie Mingjue and Meng Yao spend the weekend waiting for Lan Xichen to return from a trip. Meng Yao is determined to stay out of the way. Nie Mingjue and Lan Xichen are determined to show him where he belongs.

De-anon, please!

A-Yao pillow princess being pampered by his two boyfriends, Lan Xichen and Nie Mingjue, please.

Top Lan Xichen/ Top Nie Mingjue/ Bottom Meng Yao

may be modern or canon setting, smut, smut and spoiling

CW: vomiting due to migraine, starts "on this particular morning..." ends "so I can look after you until Xichen gets home." if you'd like to skip.

column4:
Shen Yuan had to quickly cover his mouth with a fan to keep from looking like a gaping fish. There was… a man!! On a pole! In… a costume? 

Shen Jiu crossed his arms. “He’s at it again.” 

“Again?” Shen Yuan repeated weakly. 

Shen Jiu snarled, “that boy has been coming to this forest every week now to dance in that ridiculous outfit.” 

A story about a world where humans are descended from birds, and have interesting mating rituals as a result.
column7:
The end!
I hope you like this attempt to make a fic that feels like a comic but doesn't have nearly as much panels + is so much easier to produce.
I know images sometimes ruin the flow of reading. Hopefully that wasn't the case here + it was an easy read? Let me know! I'd like to experiment with this form of storytelling more and I am eager to make improvements!!

Anyways, this AU has been on my mind for a YEAR. Ever since I made a Qijiu drawing in this AU XD I have been so eager to expand on it bc BIRD!AUs should be a thing!!! Let's make it so!

In this AU, LBH did not have a chance to come to the peak when he was younger + is instead a solo cultivator, trying to build a core (unsuccessfully) through bits and pieces he's gathered. He also hasn't come into his demon inheritance yet. Honestly, he's a little lonely on his own and therefore thinks it's best to attract a mate.

And if you're are curious what LBH is, he is a Black Sicklebill. YES, these birds do dance on top of wooden poles to attract a mate XD Here's an image from Apex Expeditions:

ALSO. Please be careful about sharing just the art from this story especially since they aren't watermarked. I am fine with people sharing the images just pls include credit and a link back to my twitter. Thank you!!

column4: Something to note about Lillian Dorea Potter: that hasn’t always been her name.
column6:
OK... I probably shouldn't be posting yet another work up, but funnily enough this is the only one I could write for because the words wouldn't flow for the rest. My aim is to never have more WIPs than Completed Works, so I guess I'm fine on that front.

Anyway, this work is a biggie - by which I mean I'm not exactly flying by the seat of my pants like I am for a lot of my other works here. I have a rough idea of the overall plot and the many subplots involved... because this is gonna get complex fast. This was inspired by a few of the HP fics I've read over my few years on the archive, along with some of the all too familiar tropes associated with the HP Fandom. WBWL is one of them, and I'm rather hoping I'll put a decent spin on it. I'm aiming for no bashing in this fic - because I inherently dislike bashing, and thereby pretty much tend to avoid it - all the characters have their reasons for doing what they do.

This is going to be Canon Divergent and Not Canon Compliant, meaning there will be characters you've never seen before, as well as characters alive who should be dead, and also some characters which might act different to their canon counterparts because of the original characters as well as the reincarnated shinobi, along with parts of history which might be altered somewhat, so please keep that in mind. This is also my first crossover with the HP Fandom, so here's to hoping you'll find this interesting, whether you've read another of my works before or not.

I aimed with this work to steer away from the whole 'ninja on a mission to protect so and so' or 'Harry Potter is an Uchiha' or 'someone stumbles into a different dimension shindig'. The Elemental Nations do not co-exist with the HP universe. Rather the Naruto Characters who appear in this have died and remember dying (so #trauma-ahoy! or maybe not - who knows?). Additionally, chakra isn't magic in this, and there are rules regarding chakra usage alongside magic, so be prepared for that. Along with some worldbuilding probably.

Hope you enjoy.
column9:
OK... I probably shouldn't be posting yet another work up, but funnily enough this is the only one I could write for because the words wouldn't flow for the rest. My aim is to never have more WIPs than Completed Works, so I guess I'm fine on that front.

Anyway, this work is a biggie - by which I mean I'm not exactly flying by the seat of my pants like I am for a lot of my other works here. I have a rough idea of the overall plot and the many subplots involved... because this is gonna get complex fast. This was inspired by a few of the HP fics I've read over my few years on the archive, along with some of the all too familiar tropes associated with the HP Fandom. WBWL is one of them, and I'm rather hoping I'll put a decent spin on it. I'm aiming for no bashing in this fic - because I inherently dislike bashing, and thereby pretty much tend to avoid it - all the characters have their reasons for doing what they do.

This is going to be Canon Divergent and Not Canon Compliant, meaning there will be characters you've never seen before, as well as characters alive who should be dead, and also some characters which might act different to their canon counterparts because of the original characters as well as the reincarnated shinobi, along with parts of history which might be altered somewhat, so please keep that in mind. This is also my first crossover with the HP Fandom, so here's to hoping you'll find this interesting, whether you've read another of my works before or not.

I aimed with this work to steer away from the whole 'ninja on a mission to protect so and so' or 'Harry Potter is an Uchiha' or 'someone stumbles into a different dimension shindig'. The Elemental Nations do not co-exist with the HP universe. Rather the Naruto Characters who appear in this have died and remember dying (so #trauma-ahoy! or maybe not - who knows?). Additionally, chakra isn't magic in this, and there are rules regarding chakra usage alongside magic, so be prepared for that. Along with some worldbuilding probably.

Hope you enjoy.

column4:
The kid was going to die at this rate, whether or not Jason had anything to do with it. Apparently dead Robins were just a thing, now, and Bruce didn’t give a shit whether they lived or died.

There was something almost comforting about that, that Jason’s wasn’t the only life that didn’t matter.

There was something fucking infuriating about that, that Jason’s wasn’t the only life that didn’t matter.

Well. If those fucks didn’t care about their baby bird now, Jason would just have to make them care. And he had a few ideas on just how to do that.

Robin might get a little broken in the process, but what was a little kidnapping and torture between friends?

***

a.k.a. the Titans Tower AU where Jason kidnaps Tim instead of trying to kill him. And then he kidnaps Steph. And Dick. And Cass. And...

Jason may have a problem.

Less crack-y than it sounds. This is mainly hurt, angst, and reckoning with canon trauma. Comfort will come! There *will* be a happy ending.

[summary updated 1/21/22]

column4:
During the Sunshot Campaign, the Two Lords had wed and consolidated their power and authority over their newly joined territory and then shown up to the battlefield astride dragons to win what should have been an unwinnable war. Lan Xichen, the Lord of Jade, was beautiful and possessed a brilliant tactical mind; Nie Mingjue, the Lord of Blades, fierce and formidable. They had collected warriors and rulers to their side in the aftermath, though without the fierce expansionist tendencies against which the war had been fought.
 

Two years after the end of the Sunshot Campaign, negotiations commence for the marriage of Jiang Yanli and Jin Zixuan. Caught between his father's ambitions and a family he'd never anticipated finding for himself, Meng Yao finds himself fighting a war against his own nature.
column6:
When I first watched CQL, it honestly did not occur to me the first thing I would want to write for it would be MY-centric, and yet here we are. This ended up being far more self-indulgent than intended, but that literally means it fits in with everything else I've ever written. While it is tagged as "Alternate Universe - Canon" please note it is definitely more the former than the latter.

I have to say that there are tonnes of amazing dragon-based works in this fandom already, and this offering would definitely not exist without the trailblazing efforts that have come before it.

Please heed the tags, and feel free to ask if there's anything you would like clarification on. Despite this being very AU, I did incorporate a number of canonical themes which I've tried to capture in the tags.

column4:
High Sage Kenji blesses Fire Prince Zuko with the resilience of the reed, who bends in the wind and never breaks. When he is done, Fire Prince Ozai narrows his eyes, seemingly displeased by this blessing. But Kenji does not speak for himself; he is only a vessel. 

*

The newly-crowned Fire Lord Ozai offers his firstborn son to service in the temple.

This turns out to be a catastrophic mistake.
column5: [['For distractedKat.', ['distractedKat', '/users/distractedKat/gifts']]]
column6:
This story is dedicated to distractedKat, because it wouldn't exist without her a) listening to my ranting, b) encouraging me to write it, and c) reading my essay-texts to her about the relationship between ATLA religious traditions and those of Planet Earth.

The title is from Chaucer, kind of. The proverb is a reed before the wind lives on, while mighty oaks do fall. The Chaucer version is a touch less understandable.

Warnings: Canon-typical child abuse, a little bit of weirdness around food and sleep (withholding food/sleep as punishment), and a lot of stuff around religion. If you're holding a lot of baggage around religion, you might want to tread carefully.

What this story has that basically all of my stories have:
1. A complicated Fire Hazard Sibling dynamic
2. A bit of Zukka, for flavour (though shipping is not primary; this is a genfic)

What this story has that no other story of mine has ever had:
1. Zuko wearing a funny hat

 

A later note: I use a lot of IRL traditions and myths to build up from the Avatar canon. In terms of Avatar canon, I only use ATLA; please excuse contradictions with Korra and comic canon. In terms of real world canons (lol), I draw from a lot of sources (both "global" and indigenous traditions). I use a lot of traditions that are based on the cultures that the show is reflecting, but I don't limit myself when I see an elemental or cultural reason to draw from elsewhere (e.g. with the Water Tribes, I draw primarily from Inuit traditions and Babylonian traditions, due to some interesting ideas about water found in the Code of Hammurabi). Please feel free to ask if you have questions.

Also, I consider everything about the worldbuilding here to be open source. Feel free to use anything you like from the worldbuilding here, or from the new characters (e.g. if you're looking to name the High Sage), and you don't need to acknowledge that this is where it's from.
