What this story has that basically all of my stories have:
1. A complicated Fire Hazard Sibling dynamic
2. A bit of Zukka, for flavour (though shipping is not primary; this is a genfic)

What this story has that no other story of mine has ever had:
1. Zuko wearing a funny hat

 

A later note: I use a lot of IRL traditions and myths to build up from the Avatar canon. In terms of Avatar canon, I only use ATLA; please excuse contradictions with Korra and comic canon. In terms of real world canons (lol), I draw from a lot of sources (both "global" and indigenous traditions). I use a lot of traditions that are based on the cultures that the show is reflecting, but I don't limit myself when I see an elemental or cultural reason to draw from elsewhere (e.g. with the Water Tribes, I draw primarily from Inuit traditions and Babylonian traditions, due to some interesting ideas about water found in the Code of Hammurabi). Please feel free to ask if you have questions.

Also, I consider everything about the worldbuilding here to be open source. Feel free to use anything you like from the worldbuilding here, or from the new characters (e.g. if you're looking to name the High Sage), and you don't need to acknowledge that this is where it's from.

column4:
When he dies as a human stick, Shen Qingqiu is reborn in a strange new world – a world without cultivation – but with all his memories of his previous life. After years of loving support from his new family and the best therapy money can buy, Shen Yuan is able to put the trauma and strange memories of his past life behind him.

Then he dies again, and Shen Yuan is given a choice – pass on to a new turn of the karmic wheel, or return to fix the mistakes of his previous life. He chooses the latter, but no matter how hard he tries to change things, the boy who is destined to destroy the world watches him with resentful eyes as though he also knows the conflict that is to come.

column4:
“So am I dead? In this universe, I mean.”

Tony glances up sharply. “What? No.”

Peter nods, biting the inside of his cheek as he tries to calm his quaking nerves. “Okay… so if I’m not dead, then where am I? And why are you all treating me like I’m some sort of criminal?”

“Because here Spider-Man is a criminal,” Tony replies, unflinching. “And not just any common thief. A murderer.”

Peter barks out a laugh, the corner of his lip turning up. “Yeah, right.” But the smile falters when Tony’s expression doesn’t change. “No way, no way would I ever–”

“Oh, there’s a way, kid. Believe me,” Tony interjects. “The other you, my Peter? He bought himself a one-way ticket to the Raft. Been there for months.”

“No way,” Peter repeats with a croak. He looks down at his cuffed hands, feeling numb. “It’s a mistake. It has to be.”

Tony huffs out a humorless guffaw, and Peter lifts his head, wary but curious.

“Funny,” Tony says, deadly serious, “that’s what he said, too.”

column2: i'd give my all (for your love)
column4:
“Presenting to Your Imperial Majesty, the newest Imperial Concubine: Wei Wuxian of the Yunmeng Jiang.”

Lan Wangji finds himself holding his breath. He hasn’t seen Wei Ying in so long—will he still look the same as he does in his dreams?

The doors swing open, and Lan Wangji can do nothing but stare in awe.

Wei Ying is—his robes cinch around his waist, which somehow is even tinier than Lan Wangji remembers, and his hips sway enticingly as he walks towards Lan Wangji. Lan Wangji's mouth goes dry. And— his lips, a pretty pink in Lan Wangji’s memory, are now a seductive scarlet, even fuller and poutier than before. The black lining his eyes elongates them to something almost fox-like, and here’s a knowing gleam in those silver eyes; where the Wei Ying that Lan Wangji remembers had been innocent, oblivious to his own allure, this Wei Ying looks like he knows the full extent of his beauty, knows the power he holds with every sway of his hips.

Wei Ying, Lan Wangji realises, has become a seductress.

—

or; Emperor Lan Wangji will do anything to make Wei Ying his.

column4:
You know the drill. Long ago, the four nations lived in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.

100 years later, Jiang Cheng and Jiang Yanli find Wei Wuxian sealed in an iceberg.

Featuring: avatar WWX, waterbending JC, firebending Wens, airbending Lans, earthbending Nies and Jins, Jiang Yanli in possession of the brain cell, et cetera.
column6:
Greetings, one and all, to my latest excursion into “how long a fic can I write before my brain explodes”? In this case, an Avatar: The Last Airbender fusion seemed like a good choice to fuck around and find out!

(Seriously, this fic is going to be an absolute monster. It’s going to cover all three seasons of A:TLA although obviously it’ll be more AU in some places than in others. Even so. Long. You have been warned.)

((Because of how long it will be, there’s some characters and pairings that aren’t going to appear until WAY later in the fic, so I’m going to say here and now that this is going to be mainly Wangxian with some Chengqing and a little light Nielan but that won’t be until season three or so. IDEK. Please send help.))

For most of my fusions, I’ll say that knowledge of the other material is unnecessary, but this is one of the few where I will say it would definitely be helpful if you have seen A:TLA. It’s a very rich, detailed world, and I haven’t bothered to put in lots of explanations because there’s just so much. Also, if you haven’t seen A:TLA, you should go watch it anyway. So do that and then come back. XD
column7: No, Wen Chao ain't getting a redemption arc, LOL. He's more the Admiral Zhao of this story, and Wen Qing will be the Zuko. ^_^

column6:
Ahhh, so a couple of months (I KNOW) ago, I asked if I could write a ficlet for Sel's LGJ's spy AU, got permission, and then, being me, sat on it for a good few weeks! Thank you again for letting me play around with your AU!!! SORRY I TOOK SO LONG!!!! /o\

ANYWAY I just want to say this is such a galaxy brain au, and I haven't been the same since you dropped the idea of MBJ calling SQH gege in my head. Thank you for the good, good moshang food you consistently feed us, I am so grateful for your presence in the fandom!!! <3
column7:
I needed to give MBJ a name, so I just went with what I had when I was writing "those hands pulled me from the earth", and stuck with Mobei Yi, where 义 (yi) = loyalty/righteousness.

Do y'all need some serotonin on this fine day? LOOK AT THIS.

As usual, I am here on Tumblr, come say hi! If you follow jiejie on Tumblr, remember I'm running a giveaway atm - there's a SVSSS tote bag up for grabs, so come try your luck!

(There may be another short ficlet up on Tumblr tonight, we'll see?? I meant to make better use of this long weekend, I promise, but I also got swept up in reading pride is not so this is a little bit your faults, buddies.)

column4:
“You don’t have to leave now,” he tells Shang Qinghua.

‘You could stay here forever,’ he doesn’t say. ‘You could choose to stay with this lord forever.’

He watches as Shang Qinghua’s throat works, but Shang Qinghua remains quiet for a long moment, until, “Are you sure about this?” He raises the xiushu in his hand. “If I leave… I won’t- You won’t ever be able to find me, Mobei Jun.”
column6:
Xiushu = 休书 = essentially a letter outlining reasons someone is divorcing their spouse.

I just had Some Feelings about MBJ going: "解怨释结，更莫相憎；一别两宽，各生欢喜。三年衣粮，便献柔仪。伏愿娘子千秋万岁。" (This is an excerpt from a famous Tang dynasty 休书/放妻书, which I will not attempt to translate because I will butcher it. Essentially, instead of resentment, this husband talks about the good times he had with his wife, and wishes her well when he lets her go! He pays her a decent alimony! The whole thing reads rather sweet tbh.)

Title is Maya Angelou.

column4:
Sammy is 18, and off at College. John is 43, and in the wind, chasing whispers. Dean is 22, and alone.

And Adam Milligan is 16, and fighting with his mom, and wants to come and stay with his dad for a while.

Too bad John left his phone with Dean before he fucked off into the sunset.
column6:
In addition to having John go missing four years earlier than in canon, I've also aged Adam up a bit, because canonically, he was born in 1990. Which means he was all of 11 baby-faced years old when Dean was 22. I genuinely did not realise he was that young. The kid was only 15 when the series began, and he died at the grand young age of 19. That's so damn sad.

Anyway, I wanted all of the angst of a freshly abandoned 22 year old Dean plus all the angst of a surprise teenaged baby brother. So for the purposes of this fic, Adam is 16, which is only 6 years younger than Dean (and 2 years younger than Sam).

column4:
Jin Guangshan dies, and without thoughts of how to please his father guiding him, Jin Guangyao is struck with the force of how much he wants to please Xichen, how much he wants the kind eyes and soft smile and gentle regard to buoy him like it had when Xichen had brushed their fingers together that day in Cloud Recesses.

He wants Lan Xichen’s praise and approval and er-ge’s unending happiness. It’ll only take two things. The first, Jin Guangyao has known for years. The second, is Lan Wangji’s own, which Jin Guangyao realizes thanks to Nie Huiasang’s stray comments, requires Wei Wuxian to be alive and well.

Of course, Wei Wuxian has absolutely no sense of self-preservation. This is now Jin Guangyao’s problem.

(Or: The time travel/canon divergence fic where NHS picks JGY as his agent to fix things. JGY ends up having to save WWX rather than kill him.)
column6: This technically follows the timeline set forth by Nie Huiasang’s jaunt into the time array in chapter one of Our Choices Not Undone. But since this fic follows Jin Guangyao, you don’t need to read it to know what’s going on. Just know Nie Huaisang is running around in the background playing dominoes again.
column7:
I don't even know ok. This fic happened because I got an idea of "lol what if jgy had to keep wwx alive lmao sucks for him" and then after yelling that I wouldn't write it for months, I wrote this. (I'm 12+ chapters in.) I hate writing romance. Half this fic is literally JGY making heart eyes at LXC. The other half is like... turning JGY into a better person. Which like I really don't care about but apparently the other characters and this story do.

I'm in special interest hell and this fic is the latest girl in the red dress.

Anyway, new tags will be added as I post more chapters.

column4:
The single faceless, anonymous photograph on the profile that catches his eye is shot in elegant black-and-white, and there’s something about the crispness of the focus and the markedly off-center composition that says art, for once, rather than mugshot.

 

The caption below is equally sparse: “5’6. Demanding.”

(Or: Meng Yao gets wrecked by that Good Lan Dick. Lan Xichen gets wrecked by Meng Yao's Whole Deal.)
column6:
"I cannot play with you," the fox said. "I am not tamed."

 

"Ah! Please excuse me," said the little prince. But, after some thought, he added: "What does that mean--'tame'?" […]

"It is an act too often neglected," said the fox. “It means to establish ties."

"'To establish ties'?"

"Just that," said the fox. "To me, you are still nothing more than a little boy who is just like a hundred thousand other little boys. And I have no need of you. And you, on your part, have no need of me. To you, I am nothing more than a fox like a hundred thousand other foxes. But if you tame me, then we shall need each other. To me, you will be unique in all the world. To you, I shall be unique in all the world.”

--The Little Prince, Chapter 21. Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
column7:
Thank you to my cheerleading squad as always for your encouragement and extremely good advice: Holly and Amelia, Vorvayne, weiyikes, varnes, CwythanWind, and Shiome. <3 I've had a rough few months of being entirely burned out and I was unable to write a word of anything for like six weeks, so I'm very grateful to them for bringing me tea and gently covering me in blankets while I recovered enough to start scratching at this.

For anyone who has been woefully waiting for more HOAverse, do not fear, I am definitely going back to it, I just needed some time to reset my brain! :D

Next chapter of this should be up probably within the week, we shall see! I only have the latter half of the third chapter left to write so fingers crossed it goes smoothly.

column4:
According to Nie Huaisang’s teachers, there was a small voice in people’s heads that told them what was good and what was bad, and that voice was called the conscience.

Nie Huaisang concluded, after some observation, that this was true – for other people, that was.

Nie Huaisang himself did not appear to suffer from this particular affliction.

(in which Nie Huaisang realized that he was just too greedy to give up either his da-ge’s affection or sex, and in fact would ideally like them both at the same time, and what happened next)

column2: Financial Crime Funtime with Meng Yao and Jin Zixuan
column4:
"What was weird about your day?"
"I think my dad hired my half-brother," Jin Zixuan said. Jiang Cheng seemed much more alarmed by this than he was, but then again, his ‘bonus’ sibling was Wei Wuxian.
-
Meng Yao stood, sweating through his shirt, in front of Jin Guangshan's office. He was furious with himself, but that was not unusual. This was a situation that called for iron control, or everything, years of work, weeks in the hospital, days and nights with Wen Ruohan, would be ruined. Meng Yao’s stupid body was going to betray him by sweating too much and he was livid.

In which Meng Yao and Jin Zixuan team up to solve crimes, eat dumplings, and bond over the ordeal of growing up Jin Guangshan's son.

column6:
Why is there more of this? I don't know, but there is! If you have read WWMMD, this is set between Chapters One and Two and references the events that Jiang Cheng refers to as "the full A-Yao." I started writing an "otherwise, you need to know," but this probably doesn't make a ton of sense without reading the first story in the series. Jiang Cheng and Jin Zixuan are engaged and living together for political reasons, but then, for reasons, ended up in an affectionate, kinky relationship.

This also doesn't really have anything to do with the prompt in the first story, except that it is also set in the Mianmian Cinematic Universe. Not sure if this will send a request as a kinkmeme fill, but it is not really part of the request!

I did tag this rape/non-con, but that is for canon-typical Jin Guangshan, and does not apply to any of the main characters.

column4:
“Are you all the Council sent, then?” Bo-Katan asks, swinging one leg over the speeder’s seat. Her voice is raspy, and Cody wonders if it’s from smoke inhalation. “Considering they wouldn’t help with the first Sith, I guess I should be glad for any help at all with the second.”

It's the first time he's heard someone use that word to describe Kenobi, and he bristles.

“We’re not here on behalf of the Council, Miss Kryze. We're here for our general.”

Or: Everyone has a breaking point. That includes Obi-Wan.

That includes Cody.

column2: in this fearful fallen place (i will be your home)
column4:
The gods are all wanderers, in their own rights. War roams where his domain takes him, and Death is everywhere at once. Technoblade revels in the violence and the glory, and Philza does not even have to see the loss he sows in the wake of his reaping.

And as for Famine? What of Wilbur Soot?

His is a life of wandering, aimless pain, for a stretch of timeless, formless years. It seems like it might never end, but everything is different when he meets Tommy.
column6:
I'm back with more block men fic, this time projecting (you guessed it) *sparkles emoji* my religious trauma!! *sparkles emoji*

No, for real, this is the first part of an ongoing AU series that my friend Wolfy and I are working on, titled (as you probably guessed) Dear Wormwood. I won't give away too much, as there are some things we're working on and some things I'd like to keep quiet til further down the road, but basically, it started out November of last year (2020) as an "SBI as the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse" AU. We resurrected it earlier this year and converted it into a gods AU instead, so we could incorporate other characters and play around with less end-of-the-world stuff. All you need to know (currently) is it's more based off the DSMP characters played by all the CCs instead of the CCs themselves.

Please be sure to read the tags! There's some implied/briefly referenced stuff in here that's a bit heavy.

For the gorgeous artwork for this AU, check out the tag on Wolfy's tumblr! If you have questions, you can ask either of us on our tumblrs (check end notes for mine) or on CuriousCat!

Song the series is titled after. // Song the fic is titled after.

column4:
"Wei Ying, have you never heard of aftercare?"
 
Mutely, Wei Ying shakes his head. He has learned of many things, from all his guys. The word care has never been included. 

*

In response to a kink meme prompt: sub wwx who hasn't had a good dom before meets dom lwj. The story of three nights and a morning.
column5: [['In response to a prompt byAnonymous in the mo_dao_zu_shi_kink_meme_2020collection.', ['prompt', '/collections/mo_dao_zu_shi_kink_meme_2020/prompts/1789492'], ['mo_dao_zu_shi_kink_meme_2020', '/collections/mo_dao_zu_shi_kink_meme_2020']]]
column6:
Prompt: sub wwx who hasn't had a good dom before; he thinks it's normal to focus on getting the other person off, to have to wash up, pack up and leave quickly etc etc

he meets dom lwj one night who treats him so so well and focuses on how he feels and it's so different it makes him a little disoriented; after they've finished, when lwj leaves to get a cup of water and maybe some cream, he comes back to find wwx dressing up and packing up, a little wobbly and teary but trying to hurry

it's up to you to write things from here!! some things i'd love to see: touch-starved wwx, a healthy dose of wwx's Issues, overprotective lwj (!!), size difference!!, aftercare of course, some snuggling (spooning?!!) , overall a good helping of angst and fluff :D

any verse is okay!!

*

Dear prompter, this is possibly the softest thing I have ever written and has brought me many hours of comfort - thank you for your wonderful prompt, I hope that you enjoy!

My deepest thanks to typefortydeductions for reading this over. Mods, de-anon please!
column7:
Thank you for reading! Comments are love.

It would be remiss of me if I did not mention here some of the works that have helped shape the way I view and write Dom/sub relationships and in particular aftercare:

- the series to dwell inside a body by typefortydeductions
- In Case You Should Ever Ask by phnelt
- like it's the only thing i'll ever do by quoth_the_ravenclaw

All very recommended. I am sometimes on twitter and tumblr, feel free to come and say hi.

column4:
Tommy, newly deserted Hunter doesn't quite know how it all lead up to this; Exhausted and dragging along a stumbling and completely out of it, Tubbo towards what he hopes will give them some respite.

"Thirsty," He hears Tubbo mumble against his shoulder. It need not be said, Tommy knows.
column6:
I don't really like RPF, although I'm aware that Dream SMP is technically toeing the line, so I'm very surprised that I somehow landed here. I'm a big fan of *any* platonic series (book or movie) that stay platonic without involving romance so I got hooked far too quickly in my opinion.

This is very loosely inspired by "Ruby in the Moonlight" by MatleenaMaddie and SilverWing15. And by loosely inspired by, I mean only the SBI being vampires part. So I borrowed a part of their concept really. In fact, I'm blaming a large part of the creation of this on Silverwing15's series "This House Is A Fucking Nightmare" which is what sent me tumbling down the hill of morally ambiguous SBI from the very beginning. That being said, I've chosen to take my own spin on this so don't read their works and expect it to be too similar but definitely check it out.

I'll start off laying some ground rules for this fic for mine and any readers' sake. This work will not contain any romance at all. This is not meant to represent the CCs, which is why Tubbo is blonde like his Minecraft skin. It's difficult to draw the line between the characters and the content creators but I will try my best.

That being said, every character here is questionable at best. We get some pretty screwy views on murder, kidnapping, and general mayhem that I do not actually believe in. This is just for fun but will be deleted if the CCs express discomfort towards fanfictions. There will be some blood and violence and mild gore but that is mostly done to standby Original Characters. Nothing too bad will happen description-wise to the SMP characters. The M-rating might be a bit strong but I believe in better safe than sorry! :)

ALSO! Do NOT shove this into the content creators' faces, avoid sharing this in any way that would result in them getting this, please. Based on what I've heard and researched, most are fine with there being fan works out there BUT do not want to see it which is completely fine and respectable. So please, respect the content creators, thank you!

This is just for fun but will be deleted if the CCs express discomfort towards fanfictions. There will be some blood and violence and mild gore but that is mostly done to standby Original Characters. Nothing too bad will happen description-wise to the SMP characters. The M-rating might be a bit strong but I believe in better safe than sorry! :)

ALSO! Do NOT shove this into the content creators' faces, avoid sharing this in any way that would result in them getting this, please. Based on what I've heard and researched, most are fine with there being fan works out there BUT do not want to see it which is completely fine and respectable. So please, respect the content creators, thank you!

column4:
He would have thought Shen Jiu would have relaxed a little; Luo Binghe has been gone overseas for two weeks and has only just returned. Absence of your hated mentee turned eventual hated boss makes the heart grow fonder or whatever. But Shen Jiu is as wound up as ever, staring a hole into the lit up button for the twenty fifth floor.

"Miss me?” Luo Binghe asks out of the corner of his mouth. He tips his head just enough to see Shen Jiu’s sour expression, and waits for the acidic barb. The thought of it makes him grin, and Shen Jiu’s face grows dark.

The elevator dings, announces the twenty fifth floor. The doors slide open to Shen Jiu’s floor and Luo Binghe turns his head in anticipation of watching Shen Jiu leave.

The doors slide shut, and Shen Jiu remains.

column4:
Now, it was just him. Him, but not even him that was Timothy Drake-Wayne. Not him that was Robin—Red or otherwise. Him that was someone else entirely: Thomas Connell, who gave up the city life to live in suburban Canada and take care of his young son.

Thomas Connell couldn't pull out Tim Wayne's black card, couldn't call Tim Wayne's big brother for help. Tom Connell couldn't do much of anything.

***

Or, a spiralling Tim clones a baby without thinking about the consequences. And there are many, many consequences.
column6:
What This Is:
Eventual Tim/Kon, eventual reconciliation between the batfam, and lots of Tim struggling physically and mentally to be what he perceives as a successful parent while still dealing with the fallout of canon (temporary) character death and the drama from his original Red Robin route.

I do hand-wave a bit of the timeline, because it's been some time since I read the comic, but you're getting a Tim with trauma, a freshly missing spleen, a family he thinks no longer needs him, and probably some undiagnosed mental illness. There will be OCs, because the first arc of this story deals with Tim as a struggling single parent in a new place, but the batfam will make their appearance and become the focus as we go.

So... enjoy!

 
The Inspiration:
10 years ago, when last I was into DC, I remember reading a TimKon fic on LiveJournal. Now, I couldn't tell you the author, the length, the plot, or anything distinguishable. Just that there was a cloned baby, and the very idea melted my heart. With so little to go on, I haven't been able to find it since, but my love for TimKon Clone Baby AU has not died. So here I am, writing my own take!

In my hunt for the elusive fic that sparked this vague concept, I happened upon THIS artwork, which helped me narrow down the plot!

And, coincidentally, while writing my own version, I stumbled across THIS fic, which was inspired by the same piece of art and thus has a similar basic premise. I encourage you to check it out!

column4: Obi-Wan scarcely a few years into his desert exile is (quite unexpectedly) thrown back in time to the height of the Clone Wars. This is, in fact, SO unexpected that he reasonably (if incorrectly) assumes he is experiencing a spice-induced hallucination. After enjoying spending time with his lost loved ones, he decides he really needs to wake up before he dies of dehydration. When intense meditation fails, he tries to break the illusion through more...EXTREME measures (check the tags). Panic from all parties ensues.
column6:
Far enough into posting this story on tumblr that I decided to take the plunge into AO3. You can confidently expect weekly Saturday updates here for the next...10 weeks or so. After that, who knows! (It's probably fine, I've got pretty much the whole story outlined, but this is my second ever fanfic so I'm still consistently surprised by how much I'm churning out and don't want abandonment issues if the pace drops off thank you for your patience) Will be slightly editing from the version there, but the overall story will stay the same if you want to read ahead .

Codywan is background more than anything, but this fic revolves more generally around Obi-Wan's relationships, and the sheer dramatic potential of poorly timed time travel. Also angst.

column4:
If Jin Guangshan had taken me in, maybe you’d be mine he thinks, as he follows two measured steps behind Jiang Yanli in her resplendent crimson robes, edged with gold.

It’s ridiculous, of course. Jiang Yanli was engaged to Jin Zixuan because their mothers were sworn sisters. Even if Meng Yao had been Jin Guangshan’s firstborn and heir, Madam Yu would not have thought Meng Yao worthy of her daughter. She barely thinks Jin Zixuan is worthy, even though she’s a little fond of him, which Meng Yao has found amusing on occasion.

If only Shijie did not love someone so unworthy, Meng Yao thinks, desperately. Jin Zixuan was spoilt and selfish and did not care for her, but she loved him steadfastly.

Meng Yao watches Jiang Yanli take her bows, beautiful and poised, beside Jin Zixuan. Even with his fine features and elegant looks accented by the expensive robes, his blank expression makes his appearance pale beside her. The hope and love that is suffused across Shijie’s face makes her the most beautiful she’s ever been.

Meng Yao, because he is a fool, only falls more in love.

column4:
I feel like we should name him.

There’s a scuffle at the back of his mind as he rolls up, curling tight with a shiver despite the heat of the flames licking up his back.

I mean, he’s like – us, but like a worse version clearly because oh man, this is just weirdness. There’s a flare of a tangle of emotions, complicated and fearful, resentful and livid with anger. I can’t believe this is what I’ve been reduced to, stuck in the mind of this- this child.

He’s like your age, Tommy. Are you calling yourself a child?

I mean, I am one so fucking duh. Child murderer.

-

Or: trauma bonding in the most unconventional of senses.

column2: three surgeries and a mercy kill
column4:
Does it count as surgery if the patient is a sabre/spiritual weapon? If the answer is no, then it's probably just two surgeries, no mercy kill.

Two geniuses in a radish field can come up with a lot of theories bouncing their ideas off on another, and when one is the grandmaster of demonic cultivation and the other is the best medical doctor alive, there's no telling what they can come up with. Now they just need a hospital room to put theory into practice and the Nie sect is the lucky winner. No, really, the Nie Sect lucks out and life gets better for everyone.

column2: About Damage, About Pain, About Heartache
column4:
Roy has always known this day would come. Since Ed decided to stay in the military even without his alchemy, Roy has known that this impossible situation would happen. 

Being right in such situations is rarely a balm.
column6: Takes place immediately following Chapter 3 in Nothing Beautiful - "The 'Worse-Than' List."
column7:
What happens when I get to the end of Brotherhood and realize that Ed has never canonically killed, as far as we know? That's he's been staunchly adamant that there are other ways? And yet, he kills an unsub in his first BAU case, and Rossi notes it can't be the first time. So, Ed had to have killed before. How? When? How did he react? I wanted to explore those things, and I really don't have a place in When They Pick Through to do it. So what does that mean? SIDEFIC.

I started this a few weeks ago, meaning to put it in celebration of reaching 25k hits, but now we're almost to 35k hits, and you crazy, wonderful readers absolutely blow my mind with your enthusiasm and support for this bizarre brainchild of mine. You're all wonderful and I don't deserve you, but thank you so much for loving this thing as much as I do.

If you're new and you popped out of Nothing Beautiful to read Impressions and About, here is your link back to Nothing Beautiful About the Wreckage - Chapter 4.

The title, as is usual, is taken from Nikita Gill's "Wreckage"
There is nothing pretty about damage, about pain, about heartache.

column4:
He wondered how this happened. Of course, Shang Qinghua never actually wrote about Mobei-Jun’s dick. All of his original works were filled with beautiful demon women, so while he wrote about the monstrous appearance of their male counterparts, he didn't take their package into consideration. But Mobei-Jun was… Shang Qinghua's shamelessly monsterous type.

So it was only natural that his dick was the same; just as terrifying, large, and destructive as its owner.

column4:
“You can go a long way with a smile. You can go a lot farther with a smile and a gun.”

― Al Capone
///
It isn’t the sort of place you would look for a couple of high school kids smart enough to pull one over on an international crime organization. The apartment is cheap and it shows.
But if you’re perceptive enough, you can look past the water stains and the cracked drywall. You can see evidence of a home vacated cleanly and efficiently. The evacuation is more orderly than most Phil has witnessed.
Usually when someone hears he’s coming around, they storm through their house in a whirlwind, not caring for what they might leave scattered in their wake. This place is messy, sure, but its messy in the way one might expect that a house full of teenage boys would be.
Phil picks his way past a jacket left discarded in the entryway and deeper into the apartment. There is a sagging couch with a stack of school books scattered on it.
He flips open the cover of one, eyes trailing down the ‘distributed to’ list. There, at the very bottom is familiar handwriting. Tommy.
Their thief.
////
AKA: Dream SMP Mafia AU with SBI bois
column6:
Its Finally Here fam, Mafia AU. I've said this so many times at this point but I am So Excited to get to show this one to you guys. I really like it, it was a Ton of fun to write and I'm honestly pretty proud of how it came out. A good bit of credit for it coming out at all is of course owed to MatleenaMaddie my writing buddy <3 Without whom I would probably still be stuck on a lot of shit. She is so great you guys go check out her stuff.

This contains a lot of stuff about Mafias and Hacking even though I don't know much about either of those things and did No Research.¯\_(ツ)_/¯ So Tubbo with his dyslexia *probably* should have difficulties with all they typing and shit in hacking but like...let's pretend that Sam made him a program that corrects shit for him or something idk.

Dream is tagged but he shows up for like, one chapter don't worry. Mostly this is about SBI Crime Family Shenanigans. I can't really think of much else to say so, enjoy the chapter!

column4:
The last thing Peter sees is Tony's horrified, heartbroken expression leaning over him. The guilt in his eyes is almost worse than the burning pain that's taking Peter apart piece by piece. The world starts to go dark.

There's a flash of gold and green. For one moment, he finds himself standing amongst the Guardians and others. And then darkness again. It feels like blinking; an extended period of nothingness that ends as abruptly as it begins. One moment there’s nothing, the next there’s light.

“Easy,” a woman says. Her words are gentle, and carry a slight accent that he can’t place. "I'm called Wonder Woman. What's your name?"

column2: The Lone Wolf and the Hermit
column4:
“Grian?” someone asks, and another guy pokes his head around the corner. He’s got a fuckign moustache, like, a stereotypical handlebar moustache. Tommy didn’t think that was a thing that people actually did. “What’s with the hole?”

“Mumbo!” the avian guy--Grian?--says, “is this your wolf?”

Motherfucker.

The moustache guy, Mumbo--what kind of fucking name is that?--looks at Tommy. “Uh, no? Why do you have a wolf in a hole?”

“Well someone’s been stealing my chickens,” Grian says, “so I set a trap, but the only thing I caught was this guy here.”

“Huh, well it wasn’t me. Maybe it was the wolf?”

“They were opening the coop,” Grian says, “I’ve never seen a wolf do that, have you?”

“Well,” the moustache guy says, putting a hand to his chin, “no. But I haven’t seen anyone come over here but you either.”

In unison they both turn to him.

Fucking hell.
OR: Hermit Tommy AU but due to an Unfortunate Oops in the travel between worlds Tommy is now stuck as a wolf
column6:
This is probably a bit scuffed tbh. I've watched like Grian's season seven of Hermitcraft and a few Mumbojumbo and Scar episodes but that is the Sum Total of my hermitcraft knowledge. This was mostly written just for funzies and there is a lot of shit ignored or completely forgotten for the sake of Plot Convenience. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Like the tags say, this is crack for the most part. But occasionally I will interrupt the Soft Vibes and Fun Times to smack you guys with the Angst Stick. Just to keep things interesting :)

column9:
This is probably a bit scuffed tbh. I've watched like Grian's season seven of Hermitcraft and a few Mumbojumbo and Scar episodes but that is the Sum Total of my hermitcraft knowledge. This was mostly written just for funzies and there is a lot of shit ignored or completely forgotten for the sake of Plot Convenience. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Like the tags say, this is crack for the most part. But occasionally I will interrupt the Soft Vibes and Fun Times to smack you guys with the Angst Stick. Just to keep things interesting :)

column4:
Sam is at a loss of what to do. Learning Dream's biology is messed up is one thing and learning that basically no one has any answers is another. Together, the server decides they need to handle the situation with care.

So they're letting Dream out for a little bit. Until his health goes back to normal.

A/N: seriously lol this a mostly non-sexual fic. there's no romance no smut its just exploring the concept of heats and ruts going wrong and maybe a bit of projecting from my own health probs lol??? kind of crack too just becuz why not have fun with it there will be sexual jokes but that's about it everything else is treated maturely and professionally

column2: The Greatest Thing You'll Ever Learn is Just to Love, and be Loved in Return
column4:
Lianfang-zun knows almost everything that goes on in Carp Tower. This is helpful, usually, to it's denizens.

Or: five times Jin Guangyao helped the servants and staff of Carp Tower, and one time they helped him.

This is a prequel to Three Notes, but can be read as a stand-alone.

Title from Nature Boy by Nat King Cole, but I'm linking the version by David Bowie and Massive Attack.
column6:
Warning: this chapter contains child abuse. Also a teenager pining after an adult.

This is set a month after the end of Sunshot. JGY has been legitimized for a week, has lived in Carp Tower for four days, and has not yet sworn brotherhood to LXC and NMJ, nor does he have a title yet, because LXC gives him his title after they swear brotherhood.

column2: Just a Typical Day in Gotham
column4:
When the Justice League discovers that Batman has been taken and they've walked into a trap, they are prepared to encounter a lot of things. What they didn't expect was for two teenage costumed vigilantes to come running to their aid

Another addition of Justice League meets the Batfam! This time in Gotham
column7: Thanks for taking the time to read! This one was a little more plot driven than the previous (and likely subsequent) stories in this series but I feel like the heart of it is still there. @Virburna suggested I write an installment focusing on Tim and Jason so I gave it a shot :p Hope you enjoyed! I do not own DC comics or anything associated with it. Happy reading!

column2: All good things come in threes
column4:
“I know all about your secret identity.”
A beat of silence. “Um,” Peter said, bunching his sweater in his hands. “Which… which one?”
--
Peter has three secret identities: Spider-Man, the superhero who swings around the city to save people. Parker Benjamin, who gives Tony Stark unsolicited advice on his research. And NightMonkey, the Instagrammer who keeps uploading increasingly popular but embarrassing drawings of Iron Man.
And he can juggle them all just fine, thankyouverymuch.

column2: Make an Ass Out of You and Me
column4: Assumptions tend to be harmless. Little misunderstandings, with no consequences but some temporary confusion, usually, but there are some incorrect assumptions that his family has made that Jason would rather were never corrected. Not if he's the one that has to correct it, anyway. Of course, the universe pretty much seems to enjoy screwing him over every chance it gets. Why would this be any different?
column6:
Welcome! This was my piece for the Jason Todd Zine, and now that sales for that are done, I get to post it up here! Today we got some gen for you, with an alternative look at the potential effects of the Lazarus Pit. I just wanted to explore something different than the more fandom-normal 'Pit rage' effect, based more around the more canon representation as seen in Lost Days.

Enjoy!
column7:
FYI, everything that Jason talks about in the second part of this is canon, actually. The entire bomb-on-the-car, setting-up-a-weapon-deal thing? That legitimately happened. (Someone Talia talks to in the Lost Days comic describes Jason's behavior as 'sociopathic', and I'd be inclined to agree. He actually very nearly kills the Joker too, beforehand. I highly recommend Lost Days, by the way, to anyone that might be interested.)

You can find my Tumblr here!

column4:
A Pre-Canon Canon Divergence fic.

Airplane Shooting Towards The Sky didn’t remember anything about Mobei-Jun having a child! He remembered Mobei-Jun having siblings, sure, but he was pretty sure that he’d alluded to Mobei-Jun’s terrible uncle doing… away with most of them. Did that mean that this demon child was supposed to… die for the plot?

In which, when Airplane meets Mobei-Jun and saves the demon's life, he also meets and saves Mobei-Jun's baby brother. Hiding and helping two spoiled young demon masters is twice the trouble.
column6:
Mobei-Jun getting abandoned as a child made me want to see MBJ see Shang Qinghua put into a similar situation with a lost demon child. Also, I have been thinking about Mobei-Jun being a "da-ge" for a long time and... yeah, it's good.

Now, because this is Scum Villain, there is some violence! And extremely questionable child-rearing from a human standpoint, but it's all pretty fluffy, and MBJ never hits the child. I'm approaching this with the idea that demons (not being human) are 1) hardier and 2) much more "rough and tumble" than human children, so it's kind of like a "cat mother bops her kitten on the head and then picks them up by the scruff of their neck" kind of thing.

So if you're ever like, "You shouldn't do that with a child!" It's either 1) he's a demon child, it's fine-ish, or 2) yes, you shouldn't, but Mobei-Jun and Shang Qinghua aren't good at this.

The child gets in some dangerous situations, but doesn't get injured.

I refer to Shang Qinghua as "Airplane" throughout this fic because though the Airplane Extras refer to him as SQH at this point in time, he's still an outer disciple, so he doesn't officially have the name "Qinghua" yet. He says at one point in this fic that his current name is "Shang Houhua". I use this (non-canonical) name because, in the Airplane Extras, SQH thinks to himself that he would prefer to ditch the sect and become this world's "He Houhua" (which he elaborates to mean a merchant and inventor). So I borrowed the name.

I think those are all my notes so far? This fic is complete and I will be updating once per day until it is finished. As always, I am not looking for concrit, just to share my fun.

Enjoy! 😘💕❤️
column7:
- Didi's character is based on Mobei-Jun's character. Brats, the both of them.

- In the Airplane Extras, SQH really just carries MBJ around like that. It's amazing.

- 😘💕❤️

column2: One More Step Out of the Pit
column4:
It had been Tommy and Tubbo for practically forever. They clawed their way out of hell together. They discovered their superpowers together. They started working for the Superhero Guild together before even coming of age. Tommy probably owed Tubbo his life ten times over. So, when the three supervillains he'd been assigned to bring in managed to take Tubbo hostage, well, there was really only one thing to do.

He knew, of course, he was signing himself up for torture and death by offering that trade, but that was okay.

It'd have to be okay.

column2: civets that live in your ceiling are not pets that you give names like yao
column4:
“A-Yao is not vermin,” said Lan Xichen. “And being single is entirely unrelated to my civet. Plenty of people date who also have pets.”

Or, Lan Xichen adores the civet that lives in his ceiling. Nie Mingjue is not amused.
column6: Thank you to Neliore and Klose for reading this and brainstorming titles with me!! This title was suggested by Klose.
column7:
The last three apartments I’ve lived in have had civets in the ceiling. Do not feed them, and do not let them lick your fingers. I kept mistyping “human” as “huan” and was deeply entertained by this. I am easily amused.

I have quite suddenly developed a "populate the ace!LXC tag with happy xiyao fics" agenda. This fic was born out of nowhere. Oops.

column2: The Mortifying Ordeal of Being Known by Your Brother-in-Law
column4:
Wei Wuxian discovers his attraction to men when he runs into a beautiful TA.
Meng Yao attends a party where someone spiked the punch, and sleeps with who he thinks is his five-year crush.
Both of them would very much like to forget these encounters, thanks.

Alas.

Or: Two gremlins hook up with the wrong Good Lan Boy before they meet the right one. It makes things awkward. Everybody's a little worried Meng Yao will do a murder.
column5: [["Inspired byWei Wuxian's Second Best Lay by LemonCakeDesign.", ["Wei Wuxian's Second Best Lay", '/works/27128105'], ['LemonCakeDesign', '/users/LemonCakeDesign/pseuds/LemonCakeDesign']]]
column6:
I mentioned Wei Wuxian's Second-Best Lay to some Xiyao friends, who said immediately, "ok but what if that but Xiyao." And so I fic'd it, except being me, I had to add a spoonful of pining, which led to the conundrum, "how do we fic this without it ending in murder?" And oh my god, it's 10k.

Beta-read and cheerled by Klose, Neliore and coffeeshuttle, who were all flatteringly enthusiastic about this fic, and washed away the hesitation I felt about posting!

Content warnings in the end notes of each chapter!
column7:
Content warnings: Wei Wuxian and Lan Xichen have sex when the former is a student and the latter is his TA. The TA is unaware that he is having sex with a student, and Wei Wuxian, who is the one to initiate, realizes afterwards he has erred by not informing the TA of who he is.

Lan Wangji and Wei Wuxian are implied to be having unnegotiated unprotected sex.

column4:
Shapeshifter Lan Wangji is caught off guard when he turns into a rabbit while doing his weekly errands. Fortunately, he runs into a kind young man who seems very eager to have a pet rabbit. Soon, Lan Wangji finds himself delaying his return to human form and struggling to spend a little more time with his new 'owner'.

(In which Lan Wangji is Bunji, a strong-willed yet surprisingly affectionate rabbit.)

column2: My Silence is My Promise (and My Promise is My Affliction)
column4:
Somehow, despite Kakashi's best efforts, he still ends up as a chuunin and is appropriately resentful and confused over that fact. In an effort to bribe his students into good behavior, Minato arranges for what is meant to be a long but milk run Rank C mission into Kusagakure.

It was Kakashi, Obito, and Rin in Kusa-bloody-gakure. Minato should have known better.
column6: it has been a HOT MINUTE since i updated this series and thank you everyone that is still reading for your continued attention! unfortunately life was a little chaotic and also my brian chemistry decided to be sad so things took a while. nonetheless hope you enjoy!
column7:
i have a big life change happening soon so i'm not sure how much time i'll have to write fic. i wanted to leave the ending open ended enough to add to the series if i get inspired but with enough tying off of ends so that people didn't feel cheated out of a ending

hope yall enjoyed the ride!

column4:
In a world filled with superpowers, you would think that the daily struggles of life would be easier. Tommy, Tubbo, and Ranboo find that, that isn't the case at all for three young boys that turn to a life of crime to be able to put food on the table. It's perfectly fine though, they're determined to become renowned villains and are just getting better and better at their craft.

Until they break in and steal from the wrong house.

The trio now find themselves fleeing at every turn because they've caught the eye of Pro-Heroes and Super Villains alike.

____

Or Bench Trio are dirty crime children that mistakenly break into the house of Pro-Hero 'The Blade' and steal from him. Catching the interest of Philza, who wants to adopt the little thieving children who look like they desperately need a hot meal and a warm bath.
column6:
Not me writing another fic just to cram it full of wholesome SBI family + Tubbo and Ranboo dynamic. Honestly this entire thing will be pretty light hearted, something I can bounce to after writing angst in my other fic. Just three children running away thinking they're in trouble while three adults are determined to adopt the homeless children. Don't forget their crime uncle who is trying his best to keep the world's most wanted villain from gaining interest in them.

I aged down Tommy, Tubbo, and Ranboo to be about 13/14, just because I honestly wanted to write them younger.

This thing was just a little idea that my friend and I started bouncing ideas off of. It honestly wouldn't have been a multiple chapter thing if not for them, so I hope you all enjoy all the silly little things we are cramming into this.

column4:
“Fucking—let—me—go!” he snarls, wrapping both hands around the length of the rope, painfully aware of the laughter ringing through the trees; the sounds of feet crashing through bracken; and Tommy—he doesn’t understand why the rope isn’t burning, why the frayed strands aren’t catching—it’s just a length of rope used for hunting, its not important enough to be enchanted, no one would waste coin enchanting rope to make it fireproof when it’s only use is to be part of a snare and nothing more.

The voices are getting louder and Tommy is running out of time.
There’s a trail of smoke where something just barely catches alight and Tommy doesn’t bother with a cry of victory—not when he’s not free, not when he’s still suspended up in the air, dangling by his foot, trying to burn through his shoe so that he can gain favour towards escape or free his knife—

“Oh my god Techno, your snare caught a child!”

Or: Tommy is running from his past, and finds family along the way.
column6:
Storgē (from the Ancient Greek word στοργή) refers to familial love; to natural or instinctual affection, such as the love of a parent and their children, born out of familiarity or dependency.

This story is an AU involving the characters of the Dream SMP, NOT the content creators and if they express that they want this work to be removed then it shall be done swiftly and without questions.

I wrote this in honour of cl410's amazing series of fics centered around Wei Ying being raised by people besides the Jiangs, and equally amazing willingness to support writers (even anonymous ones on Tumblr who just cry at them all the time).

Please note the tags/relationships reflect the entire story, and not necessarily the first chapter, though the rating should remain the same. This work is (mostly complete), but the last two parts need some TLC before posting.

column4:
And Here You Are/Too Foreign for Here/Too Foreign for Home/Never enough for Both
--Ijeoma Umebinyuo.
////
See, the thing about werewolves, is they love family. They’re all about family. Their family.
They’re not nearly as enthusiastic about some stray.
Sure they’re more than their instincts, they can take in kids, but you start out on thin fucking ice and Tommy’s never been very good about being respectful. So he gets kicked out of a lot of packs.
The other thing about werewolves is that they’re terrible fucking gossips. So getting kicked out of one pack is as good as getting kicked out of at least five or six of their closest neighbor-packs.
Which is why Tommy is now stuck with fucking humans and their weird smelling house.

OR: Tommy is a werewolf in the foster care system. Its less uncommon than you'd think. What is uncommon is ending up in a house full of humans.
column6:
I had this idea at like 6AM and immediately went to talk to Maddie and Zambo about it and somehow I ended up writing 15k words of fluff, cut with a little angst for flavor. There is no big plot, just werewolf Tommy and the humans he ended up living with. Because Fluff, and Found Family, and Soft

Maddie wants me to tell y'all that the title is her fave poem and tbh I really like it too.

I usually prefer to keep my world building In the fic itself instead of explaining things in the notes but I kind of forgot to do that so:
The Magical Foster System piggybacks off of the human one. Why set up your own shit when you can just use other people's shit?
Notes on wolves vs werewolves: Technically, wild wolf packs don’t have “alphas” because the “alpha” is just the parents. The whole “alpha, beta, omega” thing was from a study done on captive wolves that were strangers shoved into a pen together. I’m making it a Thing in werewolf culture though because its easier and this is magic, not scientifically accurate. Also wild wolves LOVE babies, they’ll adopt kids left right and center. There are wolf pups who were left near a wild pack and the pack was like “rad, free kids” this is also not a thing that happens in werewolf culture because if Tommy gets adopted by a nice pack I don't have a story now do I?

Speaking of the story, I will let you get on with it

column4:
“A-Yao,” Lan Xichen says. It sounds like a swear and a prayer all at once. He falls onto his back, pulling Meng Yao against his chest. “My sweet A-Yao, I want to chain you to me and keep you forever.”

If anyone else said that, Meng Yao would leave a scratch across their face deep enough to scar. Instead, his whole being aches with want for the same, and he realizes in a hazy cloud of dread that he might actually be falling in love. Truly falling in love. The kind that there is no coming back from.

-

Alternative story-line where Lan Xichen breaks down Meng Yao's walls as they fall in love, just as Lan Wangji broke down Wei WuXian's in canon. A healthier, stronger relationship ensues.
column6:
This fic is based loosely off canon events, so it's basically just me taking liberties with everything that happened. You will find familiar events and a roughly similar timeline to canon, but a change in anyone's behavior will set off the butterfly effect-- maybe greatly, maybe barely. So don't be thrown if things unfold differently.

I find I'm unable to move on from the tragic XiYao ending, and I am an unabashed JGY apologist. I've thought a lot about how things might have been "if only." And what catches me most is: What if Meng Yao had trusted Lan Xichen enough to open up to him about his dark thoughts? His personal torments? The chains of society he can't break legally? In turn, what if Lan Xichen hadn't waited for Meng Yao to open up to him, therefore intervening before it's too late for his redemption?

A few things to note:

1- I am no fan of Nie Mingjue. I have no intentions of butchering his character, but I have delved deeper into the clues I picked up on in canon and I didn't sugar coat it. No, hes not a monstrous, raping, killing machine; however, he definitely has... issues. Such as anger problems, inability to see from others pov's, indifference to Meng Yao's unfair treatment and Nie Huaisang's delicate nature, unhealthy obsession with Meng Yao -- both emotionally and sexually, to name a few.

2- I believe strongly that Meng Yao cared for and respected Nie Mingjue. Until. And you will see this unfold here.

3- The Lan Clan Love Curse is a real thing in this fic. The details of it will be revealed, but rest assured his feelings for Meng Yao are entirely his own. They aren't falsified by an enchantment.

4- Nie Huaisang has a huge one-sided crush on Wei Wuxian.

5- I also believe that Nie Huaisang really loved and cared about Meng Yao-- I wanted to portray their relationship in this way and sustain it.

This fic is being beta read by magic__mind.

Last note: I don't know a lick of Chinese. I went back and forth on how to use names in this, and decided to use them according to how I normally see them used in fic. So I will be using titles, nicknames, proper names, common names as fit. IF I GET ANY OF THEM WRONG, PLEASE LET ME KNOW AND I WILL FIX IT! ^_^
--
column7: Please remember to kudos, comment, or bookmark if you liked it!

column4:
“Could you not think of me as a friend?” asked the dragon in return, his eyes almost a plea. “Could we not be friends?”

“You want to be friends with a mortal fox?”

“I wish to be friends with A-Yao.”

Ethical dragon Lan Huan meets thieving fox Meng Yao.
column6:
I said, “ooh what if gon-gitsune, but Xiyao?” EloarDragoon validated me, deuxjolras riffed with me to work out a vague plot, Ariaste voted dragon when I gave options for what LXC could be (because if I just made him Hyoju, this would end tragically just like the story and we can’t have that), and then I added a pinch of lore from Love and Destiny (宸汐缘), modified to suit this story's needs. And lo.

Beta'd by Klose, Neliore, deuxjolras, Shiome, EloarDragoon and Vivifriend, two of whom pointed out that this has echoes of Ariaste's an act too often neglected—which makes perfect sense, as I wrote this a month ago when I was in the thick of my obsession with that fic. (If you're here wondering why I'm not working on the Neglected AU, have no fear, it is alive and well!)

Gon-Gitsune/Gon the Little Fox is a very sad story, so I will emphasize, this story has a HAPPY ENDING, but if you're worried, there is one little content warning in the end notes!
column7:
Content Warning: Temporary character death. So very temporary, just a little bit of sadness and then immediately fixed.

Did I map out a Wangxian fairy tale for the backstory? Yes. Will I write it? Doubtful. This was enough sadness for me, thank you. (And Lan Zhan's side of the Wangxian story is so much more painful already to think of—just look at what we already see here!) I tried to sprinkle enough crumbs that there is a sense of what happened, but as to the details, everyone can spin their own narrative, without being too constrained by mine. <3

column2: Hush Now (You Were Lost but Now You’re Found)
column4:
Red Chaos was the name the world had bestowed upon him, and Dream had laughed as he dragged Tommy down against his chest in a rough sprawl back against the couch, squeezing him tight after their first official mission together.

Tommy had done good and Dream had been proud.

-

Siren shifts, a look Tommy can’t be bothered to understand flashing briefly before his shoulders roll into a shrug.

“You saved my life.”

I know, Tommy thinks, lips drawing back in an ugly grimace. It ruined mine.

-

The morning paper lies discarded on the couch beside him with black bold headlines:

RED CHAOS: HERO OR VILLAIN?
column7:
I've been reading too many hero/vigilante/villain fics lately and this was begging to be written.

I really wanted to see Tommy as a capable Hero in his own right, to see him stand at the top of the world and then yank it all from beneath him. Ah. Messy relationships are my jam.

It's pretty late so I'm just gonna throw this at you and drag myself to bed on that. Hope you enjoyed :)

column4:
“Shang-shishu,” added Luo Binghe, with what Shang Qinghua knew was false respect.
“Y-Yes?”
“Are you a god?”
Wait, what?
“I beg your pardon?”

Or, Shang Qinghua is questioned by Luo Binghe about being a god, in front of Mobei Jun, and he has no choice but to make up a story about a God of Creation.
column5: [['Translation into Español available: El cuento de la creación by Cydalima', ['El cuento de la creación', '/works/37426093'], ['Cydalima', '/users/Cydalima/pseuds/Cydalima']]]
column6:
So the other day I had this revelation of what would happen if Luo Binghe is the one to find out about Shang Qinghua being a god and that idea became this fic. This is nothing but 9k of soft Moshang and I'm not even sorry. Thanks to Vampisandi, who betaed this fic for me and helped me with the title. You are the best! Also thanks to my dear Taiyari, who was actually the first one to know about this story (while I read them my notes in my broken English) and encouraged me to write it.

Ahora este fic tiene traducción al español 💖

column4:
Not once, when Tim had been considering how Jason might react to the idea of a new Robin, had it crossed his mind that Jason would be so appalled by such an insult that he would actually come back to life to kill Tim for it.

That, Tim realizes as a grasping hand pushes up through the grass in front of Jason’s headstone, may have been a grave error.
column6: This came about by me asking the question "What would happen if someone were there when Jason came back to life? Because miracle probably isn't going to be their first reaction. Certainly not when they live in Gotham.
column7:
Tim is frequently portrayed as a small adult, even as a twelve year old. My problem with this is that he is, in fact, twelve. Have a dose of incredibly-analytical-but-still-a-child-Tim.

When my brother proofread this for me, and we were talking about potential titles for it, one of them was "Todd lives at the end." That led to this conversation:

Brother: Who is Todd

Me: Jason Todd

Me: Batman's second robin who got his ass murdered

Brother: Two first names?

Brother: Sure sign of a serial killer

Me: Jason Peter Todd XD

Brother: Batman should have known better smh

Me: His debut for taking over the criminal underworld in Gotham after coming back to life involved a duffel bag of heads.

Brother: See?

Me: to be fair he was catatonic until he got shoved in a magic pit of crazy

Me: and he focuses on murderers and rapists

Me: and also tim

column4:
Tubbo, when sleep deprived, sometimes forgets that nobody knows he’s an immortal deity.

...
Five times that Tubbo almost lets his godly identity slip in front of his friends and their thousands of viewers, plus one time that he has to reveal his secret completely.
column6:
I realized that I wrote this and then never uploaded it! This was inspired by Chapter 71 of Arson_Bee’s “Dream SMP Prompts”

The original prompt was for Dream SMP c!Tubbo but I thought it would be funny if IRL cc!Tubbo was a god, so I switched it up a little!

I hope you like it!

-Cal

Warnings: Mentions of:
Vomiting (briefly and not about people),
Viruses (Bubonic plague, coronavirus).
column7:
Tyrannosauruses and Spinosauri both existed during the cretaceous period, but at different times within that period, so Tubbo had plenty of time to fight both.

THIS is what a Renaissance hurdy-gurdy looks like and THIS is what a (more modern) hurdy-gurdy sounds like!

Tubbo lost a lot of people to the Black Death but he also helped to save a lot of people. He can’t get sick, which definitely helped.

Tubbo terrorized people in a Robin Hood kind of way during the Dark Ages. He would fuck with the rich, especially when they were being nasty to the poor. That kind of thing.

The quote “I have seen far more than you ever will, Philza. Eons are mere child’s play compared to the time I have been watching over these worlds.” is directly from Arson_Bee’s prompt! (the fic title is also from this quote)

Correct me if I got any historical things wrong!

Thanks for reading!

-Cal

column4:
He found the cat in Qinghe.

“What are you doing here?” Meng Yao said, crouching down to try to scoop out the little handful of white fluff underneath his cabinet only for it to bare its infantile fangs and him and hiss, moving its butt around as if it thought his fingers ought to be running in fear from its fearsome pounce. “How did you even get in here?”

The cat – a kitten, really, small and scrawny, dirty and covered in ashes as if it had just run out of a forge, but no less passionate for it – squirmed in his hand as he picked it up.

“Who owns you?” Meng Yao asked, and the cat hissed viciously as if to shout no one owns me!

column4:
The Second Prince of Lan is many things, but a negotiator is not one of them. Luo Qingyang doesn’t think she’s ever seen his face set in anything but a stern frown. The choice is made doubly confounding by the Lan family’s staunch adherence to their values, the antithesis to the Yiling Patriarch’s demonic cultivation path. It’s more likely Lan Wangji will end up dueling the Patriarch than procuring his aid. Luo Qingyang can’t imagine anyone worse to send, save perhaps Jin Zixun. And unlike Jin Zixun, he can't be punched.

In which Lan Wangji is sent to negotiate a deal with the Yiling Patriarch, and proves to be surprisingly skilled at the art of persuasion.

column4:
“I know the nephilim have some truly skewed perspectives on our history and culture but have you ever seen anything like this before?” Magnus holds out the book, open to Warlock Courting Traditions. The text only takes up half a page, a mystifying run-on list of odd and impossible tasks. It’s formatted almost like poetry and his dear, pedantic Alexander has turned it into a checklist, penciled lightly down the margin.

Ragnor snorts into his tea.

“Oh,” Catarina says, looking at the book. “That.”

column4:
Techno’s seen a human before, an adult, in the distance.
They don’t look intimidating.They don’t look like much, honestly. Small-ish, built more solidly than Ender and Elytron, but not the bulk of Piglin.
They don’t look like they should have been able to soundly kick the ass of the Dreamon fleet. But that’s what they bloody well did. And now nobody wants to mess with them. Its the prison yard principal on a galactic fucking scale. Take down the biggest guy in the yard and nobody fucks with you.
Nobody except for whoever was stupid enough to steal a human kid. Because, as it turns out, even baby humans are fucking nightmares, since this one managed to crash an entire ship on its own in presumably an escape attempt.
Of course it then managed to get itself caught again by Ender authorities. Who dumped it in here and then into Techno’s fucking lap--thanks, Phil.

OR: Fifteen years ago, humanity reached out to the stars, and the great bully of the galactic playground came and tried to beat up the new kid. Only the new kid kicked their ass, and all the rest of the kids on the playground are too scared to go talk to them now.
column6:
Alien AU fam hell yeah! This one just came to me randomly in the middle of another project and I wrote it down rq. There is a bit of backstory going on that isn't all that important but for those who are curious:
Dream tried to kidnap Tommy to raise up his own human warrior, because surely the best way to fight humans is with other humans. Unfortunately for Dream, he picked *Tommy*. Dream will not be showing back up in this universe because he got killed in the ship crash. As did Punz. He's not getting out of this either. You know the rules.

Also: shote or Shoat is apparently a word for baby pig. I didn't really want to use piglet so I used that.

column4:
“She’ll never claim me,” he whispered. Silena shook her head, eyes wild as she looked around for anyone who could be watching.

“My mother doesn’t remember half of her children as it is,” she said with a note of bitterness. “If you do something to impress her, it won’t matter. Return the bolt in her name. She’ll claim you if you act the part. If you stay unclaimed then they'll figure out what you really are," she said, squeezing his hands tightly. Percy's heart sped up.

"I - I don't know the first thing about Aphrodite-"

"My mother was born of sea foam," Silena cut him off. "And if you're really who I think you are... you are the sea. You can pull this off," she said and touched his cheek. "Get the bolt. Survive," she said. Percy swallowed.

"What if I can't act the part?" He asked. Silena's expression went blank for a moment. Slowly, she slipped off her bracelet and placed it in his hands.

"If you're going to be one of us... you better learn."

Or

AU where Percy has to hide the fact he's a Big Three kid otherwise he'll be killed on the spot. Unfortunately for him, unclaimed kids tend to raise the most suspicion... but he might have found a loophole in the form of Aphrodite.
column7:
Some PSAs:
- Katára comes from google translate, so I'm almost positive it is not accurate at all. However, Avatar really did come out in 2005, so I couldn't resist the joke lol. Plus, ancient Greek leaves some room for me to mess around a little since it's a dead language and all.
- So, usually I'm an update 1x or 2x a week kinda gal. We're gonna try and keep with that, but I didn't write as far ahead as I usually do before I post the first chapter so it could be a bit longer. Fingers crossed.
- Y'all know I am not succinct so buckle up.
- The farther along we go, the most we'll diverge from canon, so this is honestly as close as it is going to be, I think. I wasn't a huge fan of all this foreplay-type stuff, but I guess we need to set stuff up before getting to the fun parts lol. Hopefully you guys liked it!
- OH! So I haven't located them all yet, but I do know other people are writing this same idea, but with different gods serving as Percy's 'patron' god. I'm going to try and link them as I find them lol. I know Hermes and Ares were spoken of, so keep a look out for that.
- Thank you for reading <3 See you soon!

"Him," Tubbo corrects. "His name is Ranboo."

Tommy turns around slowly, face blank. "Ranboo." He repeats. "You kept the Enderdragon that could kill thirty Vikings in a single breath. And you named him Ranboo."

"Yep!"

"Oh my fucking-"

column4:
The revival didn't work, and eventually, everyone had to accept that Tommy was truly and honestly gone.

His ghost lingers, though, so at least they have that. Even if he isn't anything like the boy before him.

Technoblade finds a letter buried deep within his bookshelf one day, written in the very same handwriting of the ghost that often lingers within his home. He shouldn't read it.

He does so anyway.

column4:
"Protect them," he whispers hoarsely.

Wei Wuxian looks at Wen Qing next, his voice wavering as he remorses, "Qing-jie… You weren't supposed to see this."

She sobs. Please, no, Wei Wuxian. Please don't do this.

"Thank you. For everything," he continues.

There's a smile on his face, small and sad, and he speaks his final words.

"And I'm sorry."

Or, the one where Lan Wangji never goes to the Burial Mounds, and after some disturbing events, Wei Wuxian dies (TW: suicide). Everyone learns the truth and has to deal with the consequences.

(Story diverges after Wei Wuxian learns that there is trouble at the Burial Mounds.)

Author promises that major character death will be temporary, and there will be a happy ending. This fic is already written! + This bby is under some heavy editing c: (Please check the tags and don't trigger yourself. Stay safe <3)

 

Author is on an intermittent health-related hiatus

column7:
So I fell into this bottomless pit known as The Untamed in the beginning of 2021, and have written around 12 fics since then (with many more in wip).

I didn't know about ao3 until my friend told me about it. These fics have been rotting away in my laptop drive for the past few months and my dear best friend tricked me into getting an account so here I am lol

This one is the first one I wrote way back in January, and I didn't proof-read it yet. I'm sorry if you see any cultural mistakes, grammatical errors, or if you see some elements of the novel and the drama mixed up and tangled into a big, giant ball of chaos. c:

I'm always open to constructive criticism, and always appreciate kudos and comments! THANK YOU AND ENJOYY :)) holla at me on twitter: @qiankun_pouch

This is mostly CQL with a side of MDZS:

1. The Yin Iron exists in five fragments and Wei Wuxian uses the one from our cute friend Xuanwu to start his demonic cultivation. Wen Ruohan's three pieces are destroyed after the Sunshot Campaign; the last piece's whereabouts are unknown. (CQL)

2. Lan Wangji never kissed him blindfolded (CQL), and Wei Wuxian always thought the former hated him (MDZS). Wei Wuxian still pestered him with a lot of "Lan Zhan", though (CQL).

3. Jin Guangyao is already conspiring against Wei Wuxian with Jin Guangshan after the Sunshot Campaign (CQL).

4. Xue Yang is a known delinquent and Wei Wuxian meets Song Lan when he saves him before the war (CQL), but he never meets Xiao Xingchen in his first life (MDZS).

5. Wen Qing and Wen Ning were students at Cloud Recesses. Wen Qing + Jiang Cheng interaction is alive.(CQL). Wen Ning DIED before becoming a fierce corpse (MDZS).

6. Wei Wuxian is Chaotic Good, but I used CQL's bias to the good rather than the chaotic.

7. Wei Wuxian's mental health is a mess like in MDZS.

8. Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji met Lan Yi in the cave and Lan Wangji tied his forehead ribbon onto Wei Wuxian's wrist (CQL).

9. Lan Xichen is the Lan's Sect Leader, not Lan Qiren. Grumpy old man is just a respected elder (MDZS).

column4:
The blue parrotfish isn’t listening, because he’s chasing the plankton away from the sea pen again. Meng Yao drifts in place, exuding as much condescension as he possibly can.

Evidently he has failed at his, however, because when the parrotfish comes back, he asks, “Why are you just…floating there?”

“I am condescending to you,” says Meng Yao haughtily.

Parrotfish Wei Wuxian is trying to save a school of plankton. Meng Yao would like everyone to know that this is a futile endeavor, and also he is not a sea slug, thank you very much.

You’re very lovely too, A-Yao almost says, but he bites the words back before they make it out.

Barely.

Margay A-Yao meets the most beautiful creature in the world: a suspiciously earnest puma.

column7:
I think it's done. I think. But if I kept this in my files it was well on its way to exploding into an extended universe where the entire cast are cats in South America, and frankly, I don't think anyone wants that.

EDIT: Apparently, a lot of people want it, and I have everybody's species already in my head, so South American wild cats AU is, tentatively, a go. By which I mean I am writing one (1) more. And we'll see if it keeps going after that 😉

column4:
When Darth Sidious commissioned the Kaminoans to create supersoldiers, he didn’t expect them to take the request so seriously. But the scientists rose to the challenge and went all out. The results were impressive and... larger... than anyone anticipated.

Darth Sidious isn’t sure why, but he has a bad feeling about the clones.

OR: In which the author saw the Resident Evil: Village trailer then realized nobody can stop her from writing self indulgent size difference aus.

column7:
Mando'a:
Vod = Shield sibling (singular)
Vode = Shield sibling (plural)
Aruetyc mir'sheb = traitorous jackass
Gev! = Stop it/Pack it in!
Ori’vode = Elder shield siblings
Kama = belt-spat, the leather flap around ARC trooper's hips to protect them from their jetpack
Verd = soldier, warrior
Shebs = Ass

column4:
It all comes down to this: the babies in his arms are just so little.

“You should sit down, Sir. Let Waxer and I take the tubies for a minute,” Cody gentles. Despite the even, easy tone, despite knowing that it’s Cody and that, as the last twenty-four hours have successfully proved beyond a doubt, Cody would rather die than see any harm come to him, Obi-Wan can’t suppress his immediate reaction to the thought of putting the twins— his twins, his now, and he’ll die before he lets anything touch them—down.

“Full disclosure, I don’t believe I am capable of letting go of them, at the moment.” He thinks for a beat and then adds, “Possibly ever.”
column6: I wanted to do something for May the 4th and this has been bouncing around in my head for ages now! I don't see this story being too long so uhhh fingers crossed I continue to manage to balance my other WIPs alongside this soft-parent-Obi brainrot. No warnings for this chapter besides Padme's canonical death.

column2: Five Hearts To Make Him Whole
column4:
In a last-ditch effort to save the planet, Cloud is hurled into another dimension. One where the link between him and god-complex Sephiroth will be broken. The only problem is, his cross-dimensional counterpart is the soulmate of the four strongest SOLDIERs in Midgar, that dimension’s Sephiroth included.

Their dead soulmate.

And they’ll stop at nothing to find him.
column7:
- My beta reader: “Cloud and RENO?????”
- I was just going to have Cloud imagine Zack and Aerith were there, maybe have a flashback to something that happened, but I wanted them to be able to say goodbye.
- I played around with a few different ideas for Gaia – something like the Supreme Intelligence from Captain Marvel, where Gaia would take the form of whoever Cloud loved most; a being that glowed golden (though that seemed too Shinra to me); or a being that just shined super brightly at first, and when asked to not shine so bright, she would take on the form of a person Cloud loved, and then turn into Sephiroth (which Cloud, of course, would not take well) – but I really liked the idea of Gaia being so completely interwoven with nature, that there was just no way to separate her from it.

column4: So this is my version of a head disciple Shen Yuan fic. My take if Shen Yuan was a shixiong instead of a shizun, because I want to write about Shen Jiu and I want to give him a redemption some how. Bingqiu and Qijiu are both in this, but everyone be thinking both shixiong and shizun are pretty hot.
column7:
I hope to not make this as long as Just One Yesterday, but who knows. That one was supposed to be like 20 chapters long, now look at it. Imma try to get this one not as long. Also, I don't know if I'll land the ways on how to address the characters properly, but don't try to help me much. If I want to know, I'd ask the internet. I'm not going into a whole thing about it. I'm not putting as much strength in this one as I did the other fic.

That being said, I do want this one opinion. Do you think Shen Yuan should address Shen Jiu as Ba or A-Die, when addressing him as father? I thought Ba or more teasingly Baba sounds so cute though that is a more modern way to address one's father. It's a stretch but it might make sense since Shen Yuan is from the modern times. But A-Die technically has more cultural accuracies. But you know... Die... dead... death. A-Die just doesn't sound as cute, is what I'm getting at.

Also no, I didn't check if Er zi was too modern, old timey, or formal to call someone their son. But whatever.

column21: ['Best of OG SQQ']

column4:
“Where is Qi-ge? Did he not say anything when you stole me from the streets?”

Shang Qinghua let out some nervous laughter.

“No, no I did not kidnap you Shen-shixiong, I just. Found you. Yes, I found you and thought you could do with some help which is why I brought you with me.”

“Why do you keep calling me shixiong? Who is your shixiong, you kidnapper?”

Shit. Fuck.

 

Shen Qingqiu turns into a child, and Shang Qinghua adopts him along with a begrudging Mobei-jun.
column6:
day 5 - a return to childhood

oh man. i really don't know how this happened but it happened. no major warnings, just possibly some things that might not make sense (if i've made any glaring errors, pls let me know and i'll correct it). i've messed up the timelines a lil, this happens right after they take over as peak lord + mobei-jun is already king for some reason. everyone is also a little ooc but that can be forgiven i think

column4: Tim knows he’s due for a heat. And he might have a plan to get his pack back together while he’s at it.
column6: Yet more 'Tim makes an idiot plan that somehow works out'.
column7:
After Jason wakes up, surrounded by his pack, with a sore neck—
Jason: you bit me.
Bruce: Jay-lad, I’m so sorry.
Jason: you bit me!
Bruce: Jay—
Jason: I’m telling Alfred!
Bruce: oh dear.

After Tim wakes up, head clear, to discover that his plan worked after all—
Jason: you want to explain why you came to my safehouse to nest?
Tim, blinking: because you’re a strong alpha.
Jason: I nearly killed you.
Tim: that’s how I know you’re strong.

After they return to the Manor, with Jason grinning at the breakfast table as Alfred glares at a penitent Bruce—
Dick: between you and me, you did this on purpose, didn’t you, baby bird.
Tim: I don’t know what you’re talking about.
Dick: I taught you that wide-eyed look, you little shit.

At night, when everyone piles into a giant nest—
Jason, lip wobbling: my neck still hurts.
Bruce, alarmed: oh no, Jay, how can I make it better?
Jason, curling up: hair pets.
Bruce: but I thought it was your neck that was hurting—
Jason: hair pets.
Dick and Tim: *giggling silently in the background*
